name: HIVE/ BEECHARGE!!!, THE
description: Bees will once again be buzzing the Playa:  come get Buzzed at the Hive:  and meet us at the Man at 2 PM on Thursday to join the Swarm!!

name: !Zoom!
description: Come frolic through the maze to our garden of highly evolved plants that glow at night.   Enjoy a short rest in our cool & shaded Zoom Dome.  Tuesday & Wednesday nights join us for the next evolution of baseball on fire.  Wednesday poi & staff lessons midday.

name: Playfully Yours
description: A dungeonous experience, couples and singles experience the softer and more sensual side of BDSM play. Our camp is a play station well equipped, safe environment.  An outside 8ft. chain web (Charlott’s Web)is available for play, provides a good photo opportunity, public and private play space.

name: R&R" with Divas on the Playa
description: Come “Relax and Refresh” with Divas on the Playa. Spend some time in our R&R, and you’ll EVOLVE into a Diva too! RELAX under ceiling fans, sip organic sun tea, get a massage – REFRESH with facial wipes, moisturizer, natural lotions & body sprays, sunscreen, Playafoot repair, and More!

name: A Brand Gnu Ewe
description: A Brand Gnu Ewe will be creating fun, artistic brands for brand-able objects!  Items like cutting boards, skateboards, leather articles of clothing/apparel; anything brand-able!

name: A Camp With No Name
description: Beating the dead horse for yet another year! Sitting in the desert at A Camp With No Name…with snow cones and chai.

name: A Cavallo
description: As A Cavallo sits in an exotic foreign drydock, after severe storms whipped the crew to tatters, a scout crew explores the frontier in the Bonewagon. Made from deadstuff, piloted by deadfolks, driven by dead horses.

name: Above The Limit
description: Darwins Monkey Bar & Treetops Lounge, The Crystal Caverns 40 dome chill space, Cafι Konas coffee & chai, The Royal Barge, Evolution Island Bar, F-15 Interceptor, and over 150 gallons of finest homebrew & exotic beveragesjoin our Beervolution, entertaining friends new and old around the clock!

name: abstininthe
description: Abstininthe is the friendly bar on the playa,providing our special drink to the thirsty of BRC since the last millenium. Come try our many flavors and enjoy the music, ambience and conversation of our neighborhood bar.

name: Academy of Fools
description: Welcome comrades and fools! We are bringing you the team of the globally acclaimed Slavas Snowshow and its’ creator, Slava Polunin, president of the Academy.  We invite all the lovers of life to the foolest to our theatre of ritual magic, pageantry, games & fantasy.

name: Adult SuperVision
description: Whether you’re a baby, a school kid or a full-grown rule-breaker, Adult Supervision is what you need!  Come party in the Bass Crib or take a licking at the Spanking Station; after school punch and diapers are available.

name: Advice Booth Camp
description: Come and sit down for some advice on anything that is concerning you in your life. Or take one of our workshops on practical advice giving.

name: Aftermath
description: The bombs have fallen!  Has enough time passed for the world to be safe enough for survivors to come out of our fallout shelter?

name: alQmy Camp
description: Empowering Transformations.

name: Alternative Energy Zone Village
description: If you have an interest in alternative energy, then welcome, you are invited to join our village of friendly folks . You will see and learn about solar panels, wind generators, solar ovens, solar showers, water cleaning, MANY MANY blinky lights, and people who can show YOU how to do it too.

name: Altitude Lounge
description: Boise and Denver burners come together for our 4th year to bring you Altitude Lounge as a place to enjoy an elevated view of Black Rock City.  Come and meet new friends from the top of our 30-foot tall tower.

name: American Steal
description: American Steal: Dream Big! After years of bringing big art to the playa, we want to teach you how create your own outrageously huge art. View our flaming sculptures from atop our 15 ton crane, then participate in a welding class to learn how to make your own!

name: Amphibia
description: Emissaries from the planet Amphibia will be landing at Burning Man again in 2009. Visit us in our happy green 60-foot chill space.

name: and then there's only LOVE...
description: Throughout our psyche,love is the one constant that bonds us together. ATTOL is a place to love and be loved. We’re comprised of women and couples full of hugs, love, and  monkey business.Come join us in our Orgy Dome (a/c!) for unadulterated love, cause baby we’ve got lots to give! Oh, fire art too.

name: Animalia
description: Welcome to Animalia where YOU are a Unique and Rare Species to be ADORED. Mingle and play with BRC’s other registered exotic and marvolous creatures and consider a little musical, visual, and artistic cross pollination over a cup of “mutation punch”.

name: Anonymous Village
description: Anonymous Village is a mix of 12 step groups such as Alcoholics Anonymous, Narcotics Anonymous, Alanon, OA, GA and other 12 step groups that strive for sobriety, living clean and spiritual development. We provide an environment that promotes recovery from addictive maladies and having a great time.

name: Anthony's Disco Bar & Hula Lounge
description: Your slice of sleazy Mexican debauchery on the Playa. DJ; great music, hula-hooping go-go dancers, and strong drinks served in coconuts await you!

name: anticAMP
description: the nest for large art cars. Ken nuts&bolts, chill area, and sounds. beats by DJ,s discosean,Dorje,& giant grenn leperkon (GGL) stop by for a huge! or a lick-ee!

name: AOXOMOXOA
description: Evolution? Devolution? Sounds like a Revolution but you know you can count us out. We got to free our minds instead! “If the doors of perception were cleansed, everything would appear to man as it is, infinite.” -William Blake (AOXOMOXOA aka: The Dead Sea, Beyond the Dead, Eyes of the World…)

name: Apocalypse Lounge
description: Hangover or not, the sun is up and so are you. Come over to enjoy coffee and conversation in the morning, meet The Walking Beast and come back to enjoy the shade all day!

name: APOKILIPTIKA
description: APOKILIPTIKA Bringing doom to the playa since 2005.  Located within the village of Terminal City, APOKILIPTIKA offers a tongue in cheek neo-sovietski mercenary oasis in BRC.  Highly interactive, very visual.  APOKILIPTIKA- we end the world so you don’t have to!

name: Apres Ski Chalet
description: aa{cent}prA{umlaut}s-ski[ah-prey-skee,ap-rey,noun] The period of relaxation after skiing. A rich cultural heritage at ski resorts worldwide. We have now brought this magic to the playa. After a long day on the slopes come mingle with our snowmen, frolic with our skibunnies, enjoy a glacial beverage!

name: AquaZone
description: Love your water, Love your body! At the AquaLove Water Bar, we are serving up all kinds of re-aligned water. Come to our AquaDome chill space to connect, hydrate, and re-align yourself.

name: Arachnophobia
description: Arachnophobia is a dark cabaret filled with the dreamstuff of our people. The Gothic. The gamers. The misfits.  All are welcome to add their own notes to our dark, twisted and merry song! Expect nothing… find D&D gaming, Cult movies & Cookies, Boba tea, Anime, Goth music and other unusuals.

name: Arctica
description: Arctica is the ice sales operation located in the Center Camp plaza. Crushed and block ice are available for $3 per bag or, a 6 pack of crushed at the discounted price of $15. Hours are Monday through Sunday from 9 am to 6 pm and Labor Day from 9am – noon (or when we sell out).

name: Ardent Heavy Industries
description: The Oakland-based industrial art group, bringing you crazy interactive sculptures, teaching you to make awesome stuff, and building large-scale fire art (through pyro wing Interpretive Arson) since 2005.

name: Arrakis
description: Welcome to Arrakis, home of the spice!  Come to meet the Fremen natives and sample the precious spice Melange.  But beware of sandworms!  You must watch your step, they’re attracted to rhythmic vibration.  Ask the Bene Tleilax wizard Irslov for a magic show.

name: Art Car Camp
description: Art Car Camp is where “Daily Driver” licensed and insured full time art cars are displayed.  These are vehicles that work their magic back in the communties from where they hail from all year round.  Come see the collection and meet the artists!

name: Art Test Camp:  Plaid
description: this is a test record for playa info directory extracts

name: ARTery
description: This is the on playa headquarters for Burning Man’s art department. Welcome to all the artists that make Burning Man the wonderful art event it is!

name: asana-mania
description: A reality-defying Yoga camp. Please check calendar or drop by to see our schedule of daily classes–yoga and more! If you would like to teach a class in our space, please contact us to be added to the schedule.

name: Ascension Tribe
description: Ascension Tribe is a spiritual and sensually playful place for ritual, workshops and gatherings that connect body, mind, spirit and soul to new levels of freedom and ascension. We offer unique and popular transformational events focusing on the spiritual nature of growth, self discovery and oneness.

name: Ashram Galactica (The Grand Hotel)
description: Your Home Away from Home Away from Home The Grand Hotel at Ashram Galactica sets the standard for hospitality in the Black Rock City Metropolitan Area. Enjoy a crisp cocktail and conversation. Our well-informed and obsequious concierge will be happy to advise the traveler of all the city offers.

name: Astral Headwash
description: Good day dirty dwellers! We will be washing hair in the desert again thisyear. Come visit us with your happy spirits, your smiling faces and your dirty hair and we’ll do our best to make you feel like you’re in heaven.  We’ll see you Monday – Friday from around noon – 4 PM.

name: Astral Lounge
description: Astral Lounge is a large, comfortable chill space with a small, intimate vibe. We provide a cool, shaded oasis of calm during the hottest part of the day, and a mellow, relaxed vibe all night long.

name: Astropups
description: For 8 years, the Astropups have been known for providing a cool and furry oasis on the playa where countless queers have crossed paths and met new friends. The Astropups camp has always been a hub of daytime and nighttime activity, our events are always a good time for all.

name: Atrium
description: Welcome to the Atrium, a resting space and nesting place where weary wanderers can cuddle up in our nests. Take a load off and personalize our giant nests with our collection of blankets and pillows

name: Automatic Subconscious
description: We’re a Boston-based camp, bringing our best all the way to the playa. Come on over, have a drink, chill in our two-story dome, dance, take a class, enjoy, and let us prove to you that we may hail from the rude northeast, but we gots some love to give & smiles we’ve been waiting all year to release.

name: Avant Yard
description: The kids of the city bring you a place to explore the limits of your imagination, collaborate with others, create, and play. Through performance, workshops, parties, games, and general shenanigans we ask, What role can the arts play in our ongoing evolution? Come by and play!

name: B-man Button Camp
description: We are the Bman button camp that has been hosted since 2006 This camp is designed for everyone kids and adults We are friendly and welcoming Come on by and make a button We can make a button with a picture of you or a picture of your choice or just down right simply put let your imagination run wild.

name: B.R.A.T. Camp
description: Beings Realizing Astral Travel are Bridging Really Awesome Tribes. BRAT Camp Braves Radically Altered Terrain to Bring Radical Approaches To Benign Randomly Attuned Terrestrials. Behold! Revolutionary Artists Together Bringing Rhumpus And Thunder! New BRAT acronyms are encouraged by The Management.

name: BaBar
description: All life on Earth shares a single family tree; accept the trunk within you.

name: Bacchanal Carnival
description: Bacchanal Carnival! A tantalizing feast of games and diversions for all who venture by!

name: Back To Heaven
description: Look down from above: Your image is displayed high above, projected on a large ballon tethered to the ground.

name: Bacon Without Borders
description: Ambassadors of everyone’s favorite gateway meat, BWB invites you to let us pork you on the playa & then some. Drink at the Black Rock 31 Flavours Bar, groove as the Pork ‘n’ Beats crew lays down tasty beats, and from Bacon O’clock to Bacon Thirty we unite in our love for nature’s true meaty wonder.

name: Bad Advice Bears- Devolution
description: The bears are back!  Find the clearing in the woods and devolve back to your primal selves as you communicate through a series of grunts and hugs.  The Bad Advice Booth is here for your mis-guidance and our wise, devolved words never fail to steer you in some sort of, uh, direction.  Rawrrrr!

name: Bad Idea Theater
description: “To Serve and Project” Bad Idea Theater returns to bring you refreshment of the mind and body. Come see the next evolution of our expanded lounge and theater complex, providing you the best in Psychotronic entertainment. What’s Psychotronic, you ask? Look here http://www.badideatheater.com/movie_faq,

name: Baggage Check
description: Got some baggage (Fear of commitment? Close-minded? Bitterness over unrequited love?) youd like to get rid of? Dont carry that baggage around with you, leave it with us and well take care of it.  Unclaimed baggage will be burned Sunday night at the temple burn. Emotional baggage only!

name: Balyx Boutique
description: Balyx fashion consultants available Tue-Sat 10a-1p. We have clothes and accessories & a creative area to create your own special look. After you find what you’ve been missing, take a stroll down the crooked curve runway where u will end at our Ceremonial Arc of Youth.

name: Barbarian Camp
description: Are you fit enough to EVOLVE and climb through the slime? Can you survive the barbarian challenge obstacle course? Heave the Stone of Testing over your head, then defeat our champion in boffer combat. Hurrah! You will be celebrated as a barbarian hero!

name: Barbie Death Village
description: Barbie Death Village springs forth after absorbing Wheee!Ville and our mission is: Today the playa, tomorrow the world.  Come visit our camps: Barbie’s Death Camp, Barbie’s Wine Bistro, Eden, Preserved In Time, BRC Body & Paint, and Boosh Camp: Canadian Splinter Squad. You may never be able to leave.

name: Barbie's Death Camp
description: For the tenth consecutive year Barbie’s Death Camp (AKA Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro in years past) will be thrilling the denizens of Black Rock City with our eye-popping display of over 1200 Barbies in various states of expiration while our visitors sip on the finest cabernet on the entire playa.

name: Barbie's Wine Bistro
description: Barbie’s Wine Bistro is back for it’s ninth year serving nothing but the finest cabernet sauvignons, merlots, and zins to all who stop by Barbie Death Village.  Bring your knowledge of vinoculture and talk wine with Frank the Vintner and his fellow Barbiebarians.  21 and over only please.

name: Bass Camp
description: Basscamp is back in 09 with even more heart pounding bass for your listening pleasure.  Keep your eye out for Ganesh balzin’ through the night.

name: Bat Country
description: Bat Country will be amok with apes and lizards this year, come devolve and revolve with us on Hunter S Tuesday. Join us for another savage journey filled with apes, lizards, vibrating hugs, epic rants, fear, love, loathing and damn good books. “Morality is temporary, wisdom is permanent.”-HST

name: Bavarian Illuminati M/C Camp
description: The Bavarian Illuminati M/C returns to the playa – come learn from the True Secret Masters!

name: Big Bang Lounge
description: Bored? Thirsty?  Need some shade? Come join the amusement of the Big Bang Lounge.  Join us for a martini lunch or an evening cocktail.  We provide the spirits, the fun and the atmosphere you provide the cup.  Check out the What, When, Where for more information and find us located at Martini Village.

name: Big Puffy Yellow
description: There is hope for Mankind. All things puffy, and yellow – a collective of artists and techies that enjoy visitors of all walks of life, camp camaraderie, music, communal cooking, drinking morning coffee and ice cold beer – enjoy an overabundance of all things puffy, and yellow.  Orlando, FL

name: Bike & Booze
description: Join us for a daily playa ride at 3PM! Come early to enjoy some booze and meet other bike enthusiasts.

name: Bike Rock City
description: Bicycle Repair. We will do our best to fix your ride. We have no extra parts or tubes, just plenty of skill and experience. Come prepared to barter.

name: Biloba Wow!
description: a Ginkgo Biloba Experience – GET SMARTer get back the memories of the things that you know you forgot! Our friendly bar is serving up CBGB tea!  Visit our Salon de Beaute & Inappropriate massage. Our stylists want to crown you with a custom, icy-cold, fashionable GB head-wrap! Say WOW NOW!

name: Bioluminati
description: Bioluminati has been illuminating the Playa for fourteen years with art installations, feasts, art quests, and now: PIMP YR BIKE; the bling-ification station where Black Rock Citizens upgrade their rides with that extra get-up-and-glow. Open Daily. Great for kids! And every evening, Micro Cinema!

name: Biscuit
description: Come for the balloons, stay for the biscuits…

name: Black Rock Astronomical Society
description: Established in 7000 BC, the Black Rock Astronomical Society is a disorganization of amateur astronomers on the remnants of the prehistoric Lake Lahontan. After nightfall, peer though our telescopes to see closeups of the Moon, and whatever planets and nebulae we find visible and interesting.

name: Black Rock Beacon
description: We will be producing a daily newspaper for Black Rock City with a mix of fun articles and serious news. Our Press Club & News Room will provide shade and refreshment for ourselves as well as other members of the press and interested burners.

name: Black Rock Boutique
description: Providing fun funky freaky fashion for citizens of Black Rock City since 1995. Open daily 11-4pmish. check the What When Where for our party schedule. Daily runway struts at 5pm. Awesome clothing donations gladly accepted.

name: Black Rock Brews
description: A camp for the beer Lover! Many gallons of frosty homemade beer for everyone to enjoy. Come on by sit back and relax kick up your feet and enjoy a frosty cold one.

name: Black Rock Center for Unlearning
description: Got too much on your mind? All those facts and figures got you down? At the Black Rock Center for Unlearning you’ll finally let go of the burdens of knowledge. Let our UNtrained professionals help you UNfigure out where you don’t want to go and what you don’t want to become.

name: Black Rock City Airbrush
description: Come one, come all! Body Art and T shirts! We are gifting away custom airbrushed T-shirts, made to order! they go fast every year so bring your own if you have it. You say it, we spray it.

name: Black Rock City Body & Paint
description: Smooth away the rough edges at Black Rock City Body & Paint. Have some cosmetic tomfoolery applied by a fake Doctor or a real nurse! Nestled within the confines of Barbie Death Village we cater to those in need of temporary tempra or day-glo. Most insurance accepted.

name: Black Rock City Canoe Club
description: Its alimentary, my dear Watson: a) seek out the red canoe, b) partake of our Primordial Soup du jour, c) burp, d) Evolve!

name: Black Rock City Hardware Shoppe
description: The Black Rock City Hardware Shoppe will be onsite with a variety of tools and supplies to help fix or build things that are broke or need to be built on the playa. We’ll have hand tools, power tools, bike parts, fasteners, duck tape, etc. Open every day from the time we get up till sundown.

name: Black Rock City Hot Rod Association
description: Here at HOT WHEELZ CAMP, we offer the gift of mobility to fellow Burners who might have difficulty traveling to the far reaches of Black Rock City, and if needed a place to camp. It is our goal to expand and enhance the opportunities of our Themecamp guests to PARTICIPATE!

name: Black Rock City Post Office
description: Providing service and delivery of your U.S. and playa mail, on and off playa. Trade post cards, stamps, performance art, socialization & integration, to receive your certified citizenship. Join us to, make post cards, work windows, and deliver the mail. There’s no team in Fuck You so join the team.

name: Black Rock City Post Office 2.0
description: Mail the default world or someone across the playa! Our skilled postal staff is ready to give the best in bureaucracy art! Come to 9 o’clock plaza for fun and adventure. Bring stamps! Share your postcards! The postal window is the frame that outlines some of the most unique performance art anywhere.

name: Black Rock City Public Library
description: Welcome to the Black Rock City Public Library!  Please stop by, pick up or donate a book, chat with our librarians, and stay for our story time hour at noon each day!

name: Black Rock City Recycle Camp
description: Black Rock City Recycle Camp wants your aluminum cans, all of them. Come on by 9am to 5pm Monday through Sunday with your cans and crush them with our state of the ART! can crushing machine and we will get them recycled and donate the proceeds to the Gerlach School for you. See you out in the dust!!!

name: Black Rock City Welding And Repair
description: Welding, repair, adjustment and general tinkering help.

name: Black Rock Diner
description: Changing lives, one grilled cheese at a time.  A favorite underground chillspace for those wanting a little warmth in the whey hours of the morning, the Black Rock Diner serves up grilled cheese, groovy music, and good vibrations, for our late night playa neighbors.  From 11pm until dawn.

name: Black Rock French Maid Brigade
description: Black Rock French Maids.  We work very hard to remove the dust from all body parts, cracks and crevices!

name: Black Rock Fun Jet Airlines
description: Visit Black Rock Fun Jet, check your baggage at the door, and join us on a journey to one of our fabulous states of mind.  All exotic locations have direct flights from Black Rock City.  Black Rock Fun Jet Airlines is the only airline to fly during your Burn!

name: Black Rock Lemonade
description: Providing cold lemonade to Dusty Humans

name: Black Rock Roller Disco
description: Come get your skate groove on at the Black Rock Roller Disco. We’re open 24/7 and will be pumpin’ up the jams with the old school funk and roller disco beat. This year DJ/s are linging up and the band, Soul Glow will be in the house.  Take a ride on the Soul Train or stop at the Soul Man Bar.

name: Black Rock Spatial Delivery
description: Our uniformed bike messengers have served our community with playawide delivery services for your missives, parcels, letters, schwag since 1999.

name: Black Rock Travel Agency
description: The Black Rock Travel Agency has been serving and supporting The Airport at Port of Entry Village since 1999. BRTA is one of the oldest theme camps that are still talking to one another. Est. in 1996 with 3 members, it has grown to over 50 travel agents. We’ll help you get where you need to go!

name: Black Rock University
description: Long a refuge from the fierce realities of the BRC’s cutthroat private sector of gifting, Black Rock University is poised to serve, figuratively, as both a tent pole and a beacon lamp in an era plagued by dust storms of uncertainty. The traditional happy hours and intramural sports will be provided.

name: Black Rock Yearbook
description: Black Rock Yearbook ! Recording your memories so you don’t have to Drink with students,get spanked by a teacher in detention and be let out by having your picture taken for the yearbook. We want pictures of your art and the makers. contact us to schedule, we come 2 u

name: Black Rose City
description: Black Rose City is a Portland Based theme camp made up of an eclectic and colorful group artists and expressionists.  Black Rose City is home to Art Car, “Robo Bee Bumble Bus”.

name: BLD
description: The BLD will be hosting Newt’s Bar for the 16th year on the playa.

name: Bloop
description: “The Future is Better Together.”  We want to create a more compassionate world by bringing fun & joy to the playa.  Enjoy wine and cheese, play drunken twister, or be gifted with one of life’s simplest & purest of pleasures, Kissing!

name: Blue Oasis
description: Each evening movies will be presented in the Blue Oasis Theater.  Enjoy movies on a big screen under the stars with full stereo sound.  Our film collection includes big name feature films, cult movies and true art collectables.  Or, bring your own (DVD format only) and arrange for special shows.

name: BMIR 94.5 FM
description: BMIR 94.5 FM is your all-purpose playa purveyor of sonic scintillations and audio oddities (aka desert radio at its finest). Featuring a mix of music, news, interviews, weather and traffic reports, and whatever YOU decide to bring, BMIR is a community resource for expression and exchange.

name: Board-Board Camp
description: Our camp will have a small museum dedicated to the evolution of Boardgames. We will have shaded tables for playing the newest board game “Partyers of the Playa” with thanks to Mr. Teuber,and come by and see our art car decorated with circuit boards.

name: Bob's Rainforest
description: Mist and mayhem at its finest: ruled by Bob the inflatable dinosaur, Bob’s Rainforest is a bunch of self-proclaimed jerks having a great time amusing themselves & their guests. By Bob’s decree his minions mist people, throw dance parties, tiki-ify innocent passersby, & hold an event known as Porn:30.

name: BOCCE BANDIS
description: Bicycling boldly, Bandis bounce bocce balls blissfully between black boulders. Blood brethren Bandis beat baking by bocce balling.

name: Bodymod
description: Bodymod offers temporary body modifications. Prosthetics, paint and panache for your body.  A new pair of horns? Relax in the shade, and transform.

name: Bonehead Beach Club
description: Bonehead Beach Club is a place where you chill, come with a smile and leave with a story or come with a story and leave with a smile. But like any beach, we have an active side, trampoline, a game grid (life size checkers, orthello, tic-tac-toe) and at times a body spray.

name: Boobs and the Bees, The
description: Cliches are for the birds. The Boobs and the Bees, aka the Hive, is a fanciful take on evolution, devolution, and coevolution centered on sensuality, art, and fire.  Be abreast and swing by our pasty booth for all your chest adornment needs and assistance, especially before the bike parade.

name: Booby Bar, The
description: The B(o)(o)by Bar, a social gathering place for new and returning burners alike, consists of two well-tanned domes that house the best damned bar on the playa. The B(o)(o)by Bar is a theatrically interactive place have a drink, meet new friends, laugh, and enjoy each day of life in BRC. Come see us!

name: Boonville Cabaret
description: Boonville Cabaret invites all to act out! We provide the lighted stage,a lubrication bar, a costume tent, and an enthusiastic audience under the shade. We want to see not only your art, but hear about how your act evolved. Post performance, relax in our chill dome with a stiff one.

name: Boosh Camp:Canadian Splinter Squad
description: Barbie Death Village emerges and Boosh Camp is there every step of the way.  Swing on by and meet our friends: Barbie’s Death Camp, Barbie’s Wine Bistro, Eden, Preserved In Time, and BRC Body and Paint.

name: Bounce!
description: At bounce our goal is to make you want to move and groove to the beat and bounce of life. Bumping bouncing up and down, every night with my friends, Higher then you’ve ever been with our beats and your sure to win.

name: BRAIN FREEZE / GOT STICKERS CAMP
description: For the 5th year Brain Freeze/Got Stickers Camp will be there with frozen margaritas, stickers and our electric chair for those that need to charge their batteries. This year we will have some fire art to warm and entertain our guests in the evening. We hope to see you there.

name: Brain, The
description: A space for social experimentation where the curious can explore their past, future or demise. New friends will determine their own path depending on their choice of other-wordly tonics and libations. The Time Machine will convey us to explore our evolutionary origins and destiny.

name: Brand-UR-Ass N More
description: Brand-UR-Ass N More will stimulate your entire being, from your mind to your ass. Bare your butt at the hitchin post, get a painless brand. Reveal your soul to our Speedtherapist. Heal with Reiki touch and tibetan sound. Quench your thirst at the Memorial Martini Bar. Y’all come and play!

name: Brass Tax Boombox
description: Back once again…  Rising from the ashes of the 2003 Boombox comes a new and larger beast: our Brass Tax Ghettoblaster full of MASSIVE sound, lighting, and a killer DJ lineup.  Bring your jump ropes, high-fives, D-cell batteries, and come kick it on our stoop! www.thebrasstax.com

name: BRC Airport/Port of Entry Village
description: Black Rock City Airport at The Port of Entry Village is a FAA, Nevada DOT approved temporary Airport serving the aviators of the Burning Man community. The village includes theme camps, The Main Terminal and pilots with the gift of aviation flying in from around the world

name: BRC Animal Control
description: Since 2001, BRCAC has collected playa creatures, tagging them for research & easy recognition and using the latest techniques to allow these animals to be reintroduced to the playa. BRCAC also continues to celebrate interactivity with its own Tequila Pit Crew & its quest to find the “Winner” of BM.

name: brc bunnha camp
description: welcome to another hare brained experience from the brc bunnha’s. more bar more dust and bigger ears

name: BRC OPTICAL CAMP
description: BRC OPTICAL CAMP is for all burners needing eyeglass repairs, adjustments and cleaning. also for all eyeballs needing a good eye-wash and if you love em lube em “K-Y” for the eye. If i miss you at camp look for the EYEBALL CART out on the Playa, stop by and SEE ME TO SEE everything clearly.

name: Breakaway Republic
description: Breakaway Republic…Come take a break away from the fray and journey in to your own private evolving reality.  Write a letter or create a sketch or painting to mail on or off the playa to a friend or loved one, take home as a memento of your BM experience, or leave at the Temple to be burned.

name: Brooklyn, CA
description: Brooklyn, CA:  Your neighborhood dub, reggae, grill and couch-dome refuge.  Coffee and cold beers served to those who thirst for peace in a harsh land gripped by trance.  New Yorkers and Santa Monicans bless you with another version.

name: Bubble Lounge
description: Drift into the Bubble Lounge and dip your wand into the nectar of the stars and watch its swirling iridescence evolve into a perfect sphere with the thickness of one molecule.   In the beginning, there was the bubble and it was good…

name: Buddha Bunny Camp,The
description: The BUDDHA BUNNY CAMP is a loose affiliation of artists, rockstars, and derelicts_ _w_h_o_ _t_h_i_s_ _y_e_a_r_ _a_r_e_ _b_r_i_n_g_i_n_g_ _a_ _2_0_’_ _M_e_d_i_t_a_t_i_n_g_ _R_a_b_b_i_t_ _t_o_ _p_l_a_y_a_._ _ _W_e_ _i_n_v_i_t_e_ _y_o_u_ _t_o_ _c_o_m_e_ _t_o_ _o_u_r_ _c_a_m_p_ _t_o_ _g_e_t_ _*_

name: BuddhaCamp@theLotusDome
description: When deluded one is an ordinary being when enlightened one is called a Buddha. Every human being can manifest their ultimate potential and live a life of true happiness through chanting Nam Myoho Renge Kyo.  BuddhaCamp@theLotusDome Bringing True Buddhism to the playa since 2007!

name: Bumblepuss
description: The core of Nectar Village, and wild performances.

name: Burn Academy
description: We are members of a open fire conclave in Los Angeles. We focus on sharing and promoting performance (fire or otherwise) throughout the community.

name: Burners Without Borders
description: Make a difference by bringing the fierce creativity of Burning Man to your community the other 51 weeks of the year. Burners Without Borders is here to support you! Come and find out what your community has been up to this past year and how you can participate year-round.

name: Burning Man Earth
description: The Burning Man Earth Project is a  group project aimed at acquiring, disseminating and documenting Burning Man event information. Burning Man Earth will attempt to archive the event “in amber” employing a banquet of various geo-tagged media and information, from maps, photos and video, to exotics such as gigapan, gps tracks, 3d models, hi res aerial and even soundscapes. It can further be employed as a framework to a geo- referenced social network and participant planning tool.

name: Burning Manischewitz
description: You think 10 days on the playa is hard? Trying wandering the desert for 40 years! Celebrate Judaism the burner way with strip dreidl, the Miss Shiksa Contest, performances by the Challah Back girls, and more irreverent fun for Jews, Semi-Semites, and the goys who love ’em.

name: Burning Phone Camp
description: Open phone stations for communication with the outside world. Stop by to say Hello!

name: Burning Roadshow Camp
description: The cast & crew of “How to Survive the Apocalypse” will gather and be inspired.  This Fall, we launch Phase One of The Burning Roadshow –  a radically altered rock opera and Dionysian revival show that brings the Burn off the playa without the crusty snot.  Come learn how to plug in!

name: Burning Sky
description: Skydivers go to the sky to explore passion and the perfect freedom of human flight and we invite you along to fill your senses with a burning perspective that cannot happen on earth. We give away rides in our airplane from Thurs to Sun  find our camp and fly with us! Burningsky.org

name: BurnSecret
description: BurnSecret takes your deepest darkest secrets and blends them into the finest tracks.  Contribute a secret in The Vault and our house DJ mixes it into techno beats.  Relax in the Listening Dome, drink frozen margaritas and hear your secrets along with others, all anonymously.

name: Burntown Evolves
description: We are Burntown.  Expect the unexpected.

name: Bus Depot camp
description: Bus Depot camp is exclusively for volunteers who work directly with the Bus Depot.  It is a working camp, and everyone shares the load.

name: Bush, The
description: The Bush is back at Burning Man! This year we will going over-the-top with our jungle themed environment. We will continue to provide unique music and awesome community events. The de-evolution of the Playa begins, “The Jungle in the middle of Desert!”

name: Busted!
description: Where you come when you’re Busted: tired, thirsty, or just in need of a break. Meet fun people, Relax in our shade, drink some ice tea, and enjoy our mellow camp vibe.

name: BYB
description: BYB, Support Services, Hangout & Chill, Girl’s Camp Annex

name: Callahan's Cross-Playa Saloon
description: Callahans CrossPlaya Saloon is the Burning Man Evolution of Spider Robinson’s Cross-Time Saloon based upon Callahan’s Law:  “Shared pain is lessened; shared joy, increased.”  Callahans CrossPlaya Saloon will be open from 5:PM to 8:PM Tuesday thru Friday.  Join us in a Toast, Tale, Drink or Pun.

name: Camel Dust
description: We are a group of returning Burners looking to bring our experience and excitement back to BRC and share with the community.  Please come by during our scheduled times to learn, share and help build BRC and the world into a better place.

name: Camp :D
description: A bunch of silly people from all over the West decided to be silly together. We’re happy, we’re friendly, we like to smile and hang out.

name: camp be seen
description: camp be seen. be safe be seen. get a glow stick to enhance your nocturnal illumination and become visible to others.

name: Camp Beaverton
description: Camp Beaverton: Camp for Wayward Girls is a community for Gay & Queer Women, Lesbians, Bisexuals, Dykes, Sluts, Butches, Bois, Transfolk, Bi-curious and beyond. We intend to provide a kick-ass, inclusive queer oasis in Black Rock City for women and a continuing conversation exploring female and feminine queer sexuality.

name: Camp Bedrock
description: Welcome to Camp Bedrock  “first with fire” Camp Bedrock is the home of the Flintstones here at Black Rock Please come in and take your picture with our Fred, Wilma, Barney & Betty

name: Camp Caribbean
description: Cuban Coffee in the morning and Mojito’s in the afternoon

name: Camp Cats!Cats!Cats!
description: Become One With the Eternal Meow at Camp Cats!Cats!Cats!  Join us for cream at The Scratching Post bar, cat karaoke, and other purr-inducing activities.

name: Camp Chillax
description: We are here to show our fellow Burners what it means to Chillax. We will host participatory workshops where we will demonstrate what “Chillaxing” really is. Experts will be on site to explain the difference between “relaxing” and “chilling” and will demonstrate how the union of the two actions create not only a superior method of re-charging but also a heightened state of being. Chill area and Chilled Drinks will be supplied by some Cool people who know how to Chill.

name: Camp Cul-de-Sac
description: Feeling homesick? Not for this home, but the OTHER one – in the OTHER world? If so, then Camp Cul-de-Sac is the place to be. We are the remedy to your longing for the comforts and familiarity of the suburbs … just a few radial arms away.

name: Camp Darwin
description: Camp Darwin is brining a life size Barbie Doll box for people to pose in. This is your chance to pose has a Barbie Girl.

name: Camp Delicioso & Creperie
description: CAMP DELICIOSO & CREPERIE – Wake up each morning to freshly made sweet & savory French crepes, served from 9am-noon each day (Tues – Sat)

name: Camp Disappointment
description: Were you picked lasted in gym class, first out in dodgeball, and rejected by all the girls? Are you having way to much fun on the playa? Come on down to Camp Disappointment and find out what we can’t and won’t do for you. Interactive pseudo performance art crap.

name: Camp Ellipsis
description: Camp Ellipsis is where you will find the Ellipsis Evolution art car before its nightly tour of the playa.

name: Camp Fishy
description: Camp Fishy Never Says No!

name: Camp Gallavant
description: Ahoy, we’re The Pirates Of The Playa (infamous creators of the Mutant Vehicle, USS Nevada). We love to Gallavant across the playa spreading fun and adventure wherever we go! Visit us at Redirection Connection Village, the new hub/loading station for the Un-Official Public Transit System of BRC!

name: camp goathead
description: a nexus for new mexico playafiles since 2003.

name: Camp Gratitude
description: We live in a world of abundance and so we gratefully give thanks. The Universe is always conspiring in your favor. If you’re not sure then come by, be cleared and become present to how beautiful you are and how awesome live is! Evolve yourself and your community through a grateful heart. Be Love!!!!!

name: Camp Here
description: We’re awesome, and we like tequila. The tequila fairy lives here. We’re easy, but not too easy.  If you camped here, you’d be home by now.

name: camp hookup
description: Camp hookup is composed of an eclectic crew.Our playa mission is to hook you up with your needs to make your playa experience enjoyable.  Armed with our magic hookup cases and their seemingly infinite capacity, we are equipped to take care of you. With a 100% hookup rating, we are the go to place 🙂

name: Camp I Am
description: Camp I Am is home to the Panoramic Photo Wall (giant panoramic photos of Burning Mans from 1988 to 2006) which has been on the Esplanade since 2000, the Cubatron Cone (spectacular and dynamic light sculpture!), the Embassy Camp (live bands on stage!), Ma’aM the monstrous person-powered sculptural and various small art pieces (come and see!).

name: Camp Incensable
description: Our Camp Will Bring Delightful Aroma To Our Surroundings.. Smell For Our Big Sticks Of Joy By Our Neighborhood Honey Buckets…

name: Camp Insex
description: At Camp Insex, we love all things spineless with exoskeletons.  Come share poems, tattoos and interpretive dance that involves arthropods.

name: Camp Inspiratum
description: Inspiratum is the home of inspiration to build, create, or play.  Come play with the Crossbow Glowstick Shooters, marvel at the 46′ signal tower, relax in the hammock beneath the palm trees or check out the numerous human and otherwise powered machines that live in the outer courtyard.

name: Camp Karuna
description: Camp Karuna is a friendly camp and home to a collection of Burning Man Rangers and civilians. Karuna means “Compassion of the Buddha” in the Pali language. The camp serves chai tea and sympathy each day at 4 pm.

name: CAMP KLEPTO
description: Doing the same thing for over 8 years, BRC longest running pick-up soccer game, great cocktails, DJs & Bunny Ball…..and a mysterious vehicle!!!!!

name: Camp L*(ife) E*(nhancement)
description: Camp L*(ife) E*(nhancement) will provide a chill space with interactive art, massage, meditation, spiritual counseling, music, poetry reading and yoga.

name: Camp Make Good Choices
description: At Burning Man it is important to make good choices! So,chill with us in one of our shaded domes or rock out in our new furry, friendly, visually stimulating, elevated mushroom bar! Cocktails,laughs, dirty jokes,spanks, sensual readings, games,and some good sound advice. Guaranteed good time!

name: Camp Makin Bacon
description: BRI: The Bacon Research Institute will be continuing their scientific research regarding all things bacon. Stop by to check in and get the latest results.

name: Camp Montage
description: Camp Montage is a year round project of collecting digital images from Burning Man to create original works of ‘montage’ art.  At our Black Rock City art gallery we display over 20 large prints and numerous backlit montages, featuring art photographed on the playa from 2005-2008.

name: Camp Mystic
description: Mystics are a medley of creative energy & talent.  Inspired by a sense of mystery & wonder, we perceive the consciousness of We Are All One.  Mystics encourage the enigmatic spirit to explore a deeper connection not only with this planet & all that exists within, but the realm of the entire universe.

name: Camp Nambi
description: Camp Nambi

name: Camp Narc!
description: Camp Narc 2009: Come and play at our highly interactive camp.  Ride on the World-Famous Traveling Titty Totter of Terror or take a chance on the “Take Ya to Med Tent” Trampoline.  Lounge at the B-Loves Brew Bar inside the Thunder Donuts.  Maybe you’ll be on time to catch one of our live performance.

name: Camp Natural Selection
description: Camp Natural Selection will judge the best of the playa and determine who is fit to evolve.  We will be giving out 100 awards daily, some silly, some sexy, to prove your potential gene pool dominance of Black Rock City.  Check us out around sunset.

name: Camp No Toil
description: OUR MISSION: To STOP random acts of over-toiling! After years of slaving on a hot Nevada lakebed…you KNOW who you are! Our competent & shady relaxers WILL find & cite you for ANY violations of over-toil or bodily misconduct. A “TOIL HALL PASS” will be offered, so you & your crew have been warned!

name: Camp Nomadia
description: Is travel in your spirit? Is wanderlust your calling? Have you dared to give up a conventional home and make home wherever you happen to be? Is life too short and the world too large to be stationary? Then welcome to Camp Nomadia.  For past, current and future nomads of all sorts.

name: Camp of the Living Dead
description: Stretch, crawl, drag your reanimated corpse to Camp of the Living Dead for gasps, screams, and horrors of the flesh.  We eat BrraAAayyynnNsS!  Dance, drink, and nibble at your fellow campers at Camp of the Living Dead!

name: Camp Pendant
description: Camp Pendant has gone back to its roots by is spreading its wings. We’ll still be hosting Boozy Bunko (we were Camp Boozy Bunko last year), but we have SO much more to offer! Life-size foosball, Evolution pendants, our annual Gifting Tree and the best conversation on the Playa. Come by and see us!

name: Camp Photon
description: Camp Photon – A place for pro photographers, artists and models to meet and share their art.   Gallery space, projection area and camera cleaning clinic open to all.

name: Camp Questionmark (CAMP?)
description: “?Question Everything?”~Camp? is a community of many different people encouraging others to question. Use your questioning mind to help enhance critical thinking. Be more playful, & less passive. Through questions we will have a more intimate connection & understanding with things & each other.???

name: Camp Shrunken Heads
description: Camp Shrunken Heads is back! We’ll be making copper and brass b man rings this year. And giving away heads both large and small. And for those who are coherent light deprived, we will have a few lasers for play.

name: Camp Sietch Grabrear
description: Home of Shai-Hulud the Sandworm Mutant Vehicle.  Visit our Dune inspired camp. Play Mondo Croquet & be refreshed and entertained at the sTEAp Tea House. Bring your own cup! Wed, all evolving creatures are invited to join the Intergalactic Species Parade. Gather and garb at 5 pm. Parade leaves at 6 pm.

name: Camp Spectacular
description: These spectacular souls are back for another year of shenanigans and tomfoolery…drop in to cool out from the heat. Remember: If it’s not spectacular, you’re not doing it right!

name: Camp Stella
description: Camp Stella is a camp of diverse queer and queer friendly folks who have agreed to experience Burning Man clean and sober for the duration of the event. Some of us are active in AA and other 12 step programs, others are not. We host 5 open AA meetings during the week. All are welcome to attend.

name: Camp Tetrion
description: Experience the ridiculousness of motion activated tetriminos!

name: Camp Titicaca
description: Moonrise over the still waters of a high altitude lake in the Andes.  The smell of roasting potatoes.  Ah, Titicaca…

name: Camp Unofficial
description: At the Camp Unofficial Tourist Office we dispense advice and refreshment to wayward travelers. Our fully licensed guides are extremely knowledgeable and will help you get into the spirit of the festival. We apologize to all of those we miss-routed in 2008 and we hereby PROMISE to give more accurate directions in 2009  if not, have a FREE sno-cone on us!

name: Camp Upsie Dasium
description: Camp Upsie Dasium is an international venture whose purpose is to bring more citizens together in our beloved City. Come share your favorite flick, escape the sun and enjoy a drink in our large shade structure, view the City from our tower.

name: Camp Validation
description: Wondering if your butt cheeks look alright in those booties shorts? Hoping that someone will see just how AMAZING you really are (bootie shorts or not)? Wonder no more. Come on down to Camp Validation where our highly skilled team of validators will clear away any lingering insecurities & fill you up with all the validation you deserve.

name: Camp Ventana
description: Camp Ventana provides windows into the Being of the Burner. Our photography nurtures the physical Being, our healing arts nurture the physical Being; our community nurtures the social Being. Come, receive.

name: Camp Wannaburn
description: Camp Wannaburn is a collective of individuals who all share a passion and belief in the principles and fundamentals of Burning Man. Way more than just self expression, spontaneous creation, radical acceptance, freaky dancing, loud music, inebriated socializing, and perpetual participation.

name: Camp Welcome
description: Greetings and WELCOME to our camp! It gives us great pleasure knowing all visitors receive the utmost hospitality and leave with a feeling of gratitude. We cordially invite you to attend our daily happy hour, followed by “Open Mic Nightly” let’s entertain BRC together!

name: Campo Alegre
description: Step into our oasis in the desert our * Shadow Box * We make it easy for you to express your true selves in a comfortable, intimate area of mutual respect and expression.  Expressions will become a shadow play for others as the soft interior light projects your movements on the outside of the tent.

name: Campo Santo
description: Burning Man meets Dia de los Muertos, Death is part of EVOLUTION, Experience time in a coffin and celebrate those who have gone before us, as we honor them.

name: Campoline
description: An eclectic mix of tasteful music delights your ears and shakes your booty as you enjoy one of our special, highly caffeinated cocktails. Try the Liquid Crack! Youll be glad you did. And then go bounce on the trampoline! Or sample our games of skill and chance. Hey! I know! Have another drink! With bacon! Youre welcome.

name: Cantina Zipolite
description: Cantina Zipolite a place to get back to basics, Tequila drinking and smashing stuff.  Wrestling masks optional

name: Carbon Dioxide Camp
description: We are a bunch of punk technical artists from around the SouthWest, organized around the theme of our precious waste gas, CO2, only slightly ironically. We individually and collectively produce works of art, community organizing, cultural events, with a punk DIY, mutual aid aesthetic.

name: care-a-lot
description: Caring is sharing with hugs, smiles, and all the love you need….care bears stare! If you need a hug, want to relax, enjoy a margarita or need a care package come to camp care-a-lot!

name: CARNIE GAMES!
description: Come play some carnival games! Come on by, win a prize. Gifts appreciated and will help prevent us from running out of prizes. Face and/or body painting may be provided. Tuesday through Saturday 3pm until 5pm.

name: Cartoon Commune
description: Cartoon Commune is back with its playa publications. Come learn the basics of cartooning or practice your skills. We’ll be hosting a 2-hour workshop, or just come by for a personal training session. We’ll also be hosting a session of “longevity stick”, an exercise form; BYO stick as tall as you are.

name: Castle Anomalous
description: Castle Anomalous is a mutant vehicle that looks like a castle, has a large public roof deck, and has a private inner chamber for camp members.  Whether parked at our camp or traveling around the playa, the Castle Anomalous mutant vehicle is the core of our theme camp and our community interactiong

name: Celestial Bodies
description: Celestial Bodies is a straight-friendly camp hosting a large and comfortable lounge for shade, drinks, music and entertainment. Visit our Garden of Hedon art installation and dust off your 80s attire (disco drag always encouraged) and/or your favorite underwear for a DevaLution disco extravaganza.

name: Census Camp
description: The Black Rock Census has been collecting information about the population of Black Rock City since 2002. Information is gathered by asking participants to fill out an anonymous paper survey. The results of the Census are displayed the following year on the Census Wagon, and in each Afterburn report.

name: center camp cafe
description: Center Camp Cafe: we never close!

name: Center Camp Medical Clinic
description: This is the main medical clinic for the participants of Burning Man. It is located next to the Ranger Station in Center Camp, and is open 24 hours a day.

name: Center of gravity
description: Come dance your ass off with the dancetronauts….  We have all the great stuff you need to Relax, Recharge, Or go crazy!

name: Cereal Thrillers
description: CEREAL THRILLERS CEREAL BAR! Enjoy a bowl of the cereals you loved as a child or our special playa cereal cocktails. Mornings, about 8 to noon.

name: Children of Chaos Farewell Tour
description: Chaos, joy, good conversation – Gold Parade at our camp Wednesday afternoon.  Assemble at 4:30 to work on costumes, parade at 5:00.  Bring your best gold finery, particularly shiny gold.  If you dont have a gold costume we will do our best to deck you out.  Cocktails after the parade.

name: Chop Shop
description: Chop Shop is a small Playa Neighborhood Garage that is ready to help all modes of playa transportation with parts,repair,and advice. While you visit our shop, you’ll enjoy our special sarcasm about bad playa bicycles, the Shade Chill Spot, the Daily Chop Shop Specials and service with a smile.

name: Chrysalis
description: A Chrysalis of colorful characters and like-minded souls cocoon & reach for the Next Phase in the evolution of Human Consciousness with a salon for skewering dead concepts, shattering the Ego, and igniting the Mind; enhanced with a Performance Platform for sharing and a Healing Lounge for massage.

name: Church of Respect
description: The Church of Respect is a non denominational, non judgmental, pro inclusionist congregation of lovely souls wishing to spread the word of respect. Respect for oneself and for others. This year we celebrate with a commitment/marriage ceremony open to all and our Saskatini Cocktail Shaker night.

name: Circus Jerk
description: Camp Circus Jerk promotes evolution through gay spirit, which we believe encompasses a variety of sexual passions and psychology. Run away with our circus and get “more gay” through public meditation, tantra, erotic workshops, group exploration, and performance art!

name: Circus Metropolus
description: Behold Circus Metropolus, an indie-circus collective comprised of Circus Metropolus, Gooferman, the EnHightened Beings of Leisure, The Sisters of Honk, and Fou Fou Ha!. Indulge daily in our interactive Klownge and our High Chair Stilt Bar for choice music and circus acts and general tomfoolery.

name: Cirque du Cliche
description: Stilt craziness and live music.  The home-zone of Dookie Doodle (a BRC irreverent novelty band) and Mojo Green (Reno’s funkajazzadelic quintet), along with stilters from Reno to the Bay Area.  Even more cliche’ than last year!

name: Clevian
description: We run the famous Playa Speed dating every night at dusk…. four guys, four girls, eitht minutes, one intense time! Alternative lifestyle versions too.

name: Club Verboten
description: Club Verboten returns for a very special 10th anniversary week.All of the favorite Verboten retro avant-garde dances will be offered to The Popular Masses at a convenient time and location.

name: Cock 'n Waffle
description: Specializing in free fittins’ and chauvinist clown performance, the Cock ‘n Waffle is a great place to stop by and give those legs a rest.

name: Coffee Zombies
description: Bleary-eyed and zombified from last night adventures? Portland Based Coffee Zombies animate you, the walking dead. As the sun rises, so do we with the freshest pot of morning coffee as only Portland knows how to brew it.

name: Cohesion
description: Promoting the COHESION of life forms everywhere. We present the return of the ever evolving REALLY GOOD BAR in it’s third mutation. Come celebrate life with us and make some NOISE at the Black Rock TAP ATTACK!! Check us out after dark to interact with our glowscreen!

name: Comfort & Joy
description: Restore your body and lift your spirits at Comfort & Joy, a queer community center offering daily events including yoga classes, discussion groups, skill building workshops and outrageous performances every night.

name: Conscious Monkey Clan
description: A place of refuge for nomadic mountain deviants, the Conscious Monkey Clan unites to sound its battle cry far and wide across the playa galaxy. Inspired by Eastern wisdom and the power of Jah, the notorious Madame Astrolabe and her pillaging monkey crew, seduce all those ensnared in her booming wake.

name: Consensual Art Camp
description: Ever wonder what would happen if a large group of people merged their creativity to produce miraculous pieces of artwork.  Wonder no more, just stop by and see what comes into being.  Bring your creativity and become part of the process. (If you lack an imagination one may be provided for you)

name: Contraptionists
description: Contraptonists is a quiet place to pause in a chill space for all those needing a moments rest from the heat and have an afternoon Snowcone or possibly if the time is right a game of Naked Misting Twister  in our misted shade tent, no clothing nor spectators allowed. http://www.contraptionists.com

name: Cool Aid Oasis
description: Cool Aid Oasis does it again!  We’re back with our “Magic Cool Aid” and ready to treat you!  We have ICE TREATS and COOL AID for everyone to enjoy.  Come chill with us, but beware; Watch for flying SNO-BALLS!!!

name: CoolTown
description: An oasis in the desert, open while it’s sunny out. CoolTown has a fully misted 400sq.ft. community shade structure to chill, rest, relax, and socialize or use our self service misting station.  We have body/hair rinsing mornings and afternoons. Snow cones occasionally served.

name: Cosmic Elves
description: Cosmic Elves was seeded in the frequency of the BC westcoast tribal dance community and the LA Gathering of the Tribes in Black Rock City in 2003. Representing this intentional dance community consists of a collection of allied tribes from across the continent

name: Cosmic Giggle
description: Cosmic Giggle is a fun-oriented bunch of burners from San Francisco and beyond, seeking and recognizing all magical moments and elements to add to the serendipitous stew.

name: Cosmic Recess / Lustre Village
description: Cosmic Recess is a playground with a space theme.  We believe creativity, play and lightheartedness are neccesary components for happiness and joy!  All of our playground elements are original and homemade (most with recycled/reused materials).  Having fun and connecting with each other is our goal!!

name: Costco Soulmate Trading Outlet
description: Find your soulmate! Our staff of trained professionals provide comprehensive interviews to help you find the very best person on the playa to hang out with! Customers may enjoy complimentary drinks, random acts of spontaneous tomfoolery, and soul connections – all at warehouse prices!

name: CouchSurfing Camp
description: CouchSurfing Camp creates a space where weary wild and wondrous travelers are always welcome. This camp is about “CouchSurfing” around the world and we are all members of the CouchSurfing.org project; Come sit and enjoy the MutantSofa and learn how CouchSurfing can change the world!

name: Cozmik Dust
description: Cozmik Dust was among the first steps of our evolutionary path, responsible for the sun as well as this life giving planet. In honor of Cozmik Dust come enjoy our iced sun tea of the day, cookies baked in solar ovens, or our random events such as dance lessons, meals or unforgettable shots!

name: Crackwhore Camp
description: Who doesn’t love a Lil’ Crackwhore?  We will teach you how to properly work the streets in this tough economy.

name: Crazy Horse
description: Camp Crazy Horse is dedicated to horseplay and great indian chiefs.  Home of Pyramix and the Crazy Horse Tipi Lodge.

name: Crown Collective
description: The Crown Collective is the home port for the playa’s own Mississippi riverboat, The Lady Sassafras.Departing daily for musical adventures into the artistic heart of Burning Man, and nightly for intergalactic journeys through the universe of funk, blues, and jazz.

name: CRTT (Castra Roto Thema Thematis)
description: CRTT is coming home once again!  We provide 24-hour entertainment with themes changing daily and/or hourly. Join us for Candy or a Spanking, The Silence of the Lambs dance contest, Drunken pirate sing-along Sno-cone Day, make a mutant stuffed animal, or write a note on the Evodome.

name: cuddle cave
description: Come climb and chill on our squishy abode!

name: Cult of Levitating Plywood
description: Come visit the Cult of Levitating Plywood and see the amazing, levitating, second story of our dome.  We teach dome construction, green energy, solar cooking, and lock picking as well!

name: Culture Lab (Outreach Network), The
description: Home of the Burning Man Outreach Networks: Black Rock Arts Foundation, Regional Network, Burners without Borders, Black Rock Solar

name: Damn Fucking Texans
description: DFT is back in Black Rock and says Howdy! Texans, Non-Texans, ex-pats, Texans that never lived here yet, those whove never been here but like beer, and everyone else, please stop by. We’re in Gigsville again and I guess well bring a flag or something. Come sit a spellthe pilloasis awaits….

name: Dancing Shaman Vibe Tribe
description: Shamanism is about help others reach their full potential as human beings. Join the Dancing Shaman Vibe Tribe at dawn and dusk each day in dancing, singing, chanting and drumming our thanks to the sun with an ancient Salish chant. Evolve towards your full potential.

name: Dark Sparkle
description: Dark Sparkle is the potent mix of the mysterious and the dangerous that makes something irresistibly attractive. Our theme camp will bring Dark Sparkle to the playa through a series of interactive workshops, performances, art projects and music events.

name: DarWeenie Camp
description: Join the Darweenie Camp for a Weenie Roast on Tuesday & Thursday.  There will be food, fun & gaity to be had by all!

name: Darwin Fish Tank
description: Dive into the Darwin Fish Tank;here you can drink the water, snack on some fish food and beat the heat with our cool misting system for a genuine underwater adventure. When you are ready to grow a pair (of legs that is!) climb out of the primordial ooze and move on to the next phase of your evolution

name: Death Guild/Thunderdome
description: Bringing the potential for violence, quivering on the edge of the starry sky, since 1999.

name: deBOCCEry
description: deBOCCEry is about friends, old and new, lazy days, sunrises and sunsets.  deBOCCEry will be a place to play a relaxing game of BOCCE during the heat of the day. Shade, hydration and a game with new friends.

name: Decadent Oasis
description: Ringed by palm trees, our camp is a desert haven: a party bus and lounge surrounded by shade sails and colorful flags–plus stripper island, hammocks, live DJs, dance performances, & light sculpture. Come shake your booty in a refreshing environment!

name: Deep Heaven
description: Deep Heaven: Evolutionary Love – We share our hearts with the Playa through a commitment to authenticity and honesty. Look for the heart beacon by night and the rotating heart mirror by day; seek out our hug zones, find solace and laughter in our sanctuary and attend a playshop in our dome.

name: Deep Psychx
description: Committed to the playful, creative exploration of the individual and collective psyche, Deep Psychx offers workshops and a safe haven for participatory expressive arts.  Journey towards wholeness whilst making new friends and beautifying the Playa!

name: DeMentha
description: Come join in the minty fun at DeMentha. You’ll find great tunes from our DJ line-up, lovingly prepared fresh mojitos, aromatherapy, ample shade and plenty of cooling mist. Combined with a hearty welcome you’ve got the perfect recipe for a good time. 1-5pm daily. Dark Wednesday.

name: Den 010
description: Den 010-  “Service Above (and Below) All Else.”

name: Den of Iniquity
description: The Den of Iniquity is a protected space for leather and goth participants interested in learning about and participating in select aspects of bondage and SM play. Guests are invited to come experience the deeply erotic, expressive and creative safe haven that is the Den.

name: Department of Pink Works DPinkW
description: Our camp is Pink.  We make Pink stuff.  We decorate with Pink.  We wear Pink.  We like the color Pink.  We are the Department of Pink Works.  Participate in our Pink Parade, where you can “Show Pink.”  Come on over and pose for a photo with Glenda the Good Pink Witch.  Look for the Pink camp.

name: Department of Tethered Aviation
description: DOTA kites are flying art installations in the sky, inviting you to join our joyful wind worshiping ways! Bring a kite to our annual Thursday Kite Fly, wander in our Wind Garden, play on our Interactive Dome, relax in the shady Flailing Zone and try out your skills in the playa’s only Batting Cage.

name: Destiny Lounge
description: Abundant afternoon shade, comfy couches, chilly lemonade and iced tea, great music, dancing and fire spinning, figure drawing and other art events, and of course, our jumbo games: Rock Yer Balls and the Fling of Destiny! Also, Playa home of Spirit’s Fire! Come evolve with us!! It is your Destiny!!

name: Deus Ex Detective Agency
description: Solve the mystery of Black Rock City’s origins at the Deus Ex Detective Agency! Stop by to listen to the sad but intriguing cases of customers in need of a private eye, don your sleuthing garb, and then take off to follow clues (and a twisting plot) around the city.

name: Deviant Playground
description: DP Camp (yes, that’s intentional) is designed to give adults a chance to relive their youth through games, activities and varieties of play.  Come visit our bar, clubhouse and playground.  Look for our events in the What/When/Where.

name: Dilated Peoples Eye Spa
description: Expand your inner vision while indulging your senses… a soothing treatment of refreshing eye drops, cucumber slices and a cooling facial gel-pack… followed by a meditative lavender-scented eye-pillow surrounded by the enchanting healing powers of the Dilated Peoples Eye Spa.

name: Dirty Love Camp
description: Come on in, sit under the mister,listen to some Zappa . Yeah..THAT kind of dirty love. Although it’s not like we dislike the other kind or anything.

name: Disco Mafia, The
description: Disco Mafia is an ever-expanding tribe growing a safe container for the free expression of personal style in movement & dress And for the demonstration of respect & affection for each-other while celebrating all of Creation.

name: Disorient
description: After a year deep in the city, Disorient returns to the Esplanade. Our Art Car Wash will buff your bumpers with a grooving daytime disco. Our main mutant vehicle, the Dex, evolves into a new type of glowing and loving beast. Come play, learn and grow with us.

name: DMV -Department of Mutant Vehicles
description: DMV- Department of Mutant Vehicles. Were Mutant Vehicles come for their Licenses.

name: Dover School Board
description: Dover School Board Drawing the connection between our dark past and our enlightened future. Join us in having fun creating a time lapse drawing. We will provide all the tools you provide your imagination.

name: Dr Le Tawdry
description: Do you feel like an outsider, a freak? Then come on down and star in our Freak Show! While you’re here you may have a chance meeting with the world famous Dr Le Tawdry and you may be able to try the famous Dr. Le Tawdry snake oil.  You may even be the star in the Dr. Le Tawdry karaoke stage!

name: Dr. Carl's Dept. of Collections
description: Dr. Carl’s big board of stuff is imposing, daunting and a little bit sexy. Pick something from our big board, go out and find that something. Return to us, convince an official that you deserve a fantastic reward…collect a fantastic reward.

name: Dr. Fate's Potion Palace
description: As a tadpole changes into a frog, Dr. Fate’s Moving Potion Palace now takes its show on the road to purvey all-natural restorative tonics to wayward wanderers and wanton women of Black Rock City.  Spin The Wheel to guide you to your curative concoction and discover your fate for the evening.

name: Drums on the Playa
description: Community Drum Circle, all ages and skill levels. One hour before sunset until one hour after, monday thru friday only.

name: Duck Pond
description: Come get your tail feathers ruffled… Our Day party has evolved – 150 feet of slip-n-slide, bustling bar, DJ’s, Ninja Classes, Spandastic Playaerobics and much more. At night the AubZamZam becomes both a lively and relaxing spot to sit, drink and enjoy. Just follow the ducky beacon.

name: Dump, The
description: Our trash is truly treasure!! Swing dancers, horn players, guitarists, drummers, accordionists, and vintage decorations create a ‘recycling’ theme camp unlike any other. Dump yourself here to experience the delightful sights and sounds of a bygone era.  Free dance lessons and endless old-time music!

name: DUSTFISH
description: We’re coming to devastate you.  That’s all. Pure trash…ALL THE TIME!

name: Dusty Dice
description: Remember the joy of setting up a tent in the backyard and playing board games? Checkers, Monopoly, Life, Parcheesi… We celebrate the joy of play with just a little bit of competition. No gambling. A large Twister mat, cock-ring toss, and other over-sized games will make the adventure more Adult.

name: Dyenamic Huephoria!
description: An interactive artwork where participants express their emotions and thoughts by spraying dyes and pigments on a translucent tent-like canvas. The installation continuously evolves; the applied colors glowing at night from interior light. Colorful libations and commentary help to inspire passersby.

name: E.A.R.volution
description: Are you listening?  E.A.R.volution camp welcomes you to *E*volve *A*nd *R*evolve with us on our lounge-able *E*volutionary *A*coustic *R*eceiver and to co-create two art pieces, one in paint and one with objects.  Our EAR Cleaning Station freshens you up while making you a better listener!

name: Earth Guardians
description: We inspire, inform and encourage our fellow Black Rock City citizens to apply the Green & Leave No Trace principles and practices to life in our temporary desert home and to leave positive traces in our desert home.  Come, volunteer and participate in our daily yoga, talks or just grab a MOOP bag!

name: Earth Tribe Gone BRZRKR
description: Earth Tribe is back on the playa and we’ve gone BRZRK.  Past Earth Tribe camp members and fellow burners please stop by, say hello and enjoy a break in our chill dome.

name: Eden
description: The Garden of Eden is the place where it all began.  The place where man and woman first tasted of the tree of the Knowledge of Good and Evil.  In the theme of Evolution this is where participants can come and have their photo taken framed by the backdrop of the Garden and tasting of the tree.

name: EE Camp: Magic Circus Band Camp
description: Environmental Encroachment, Magic Circus Band, hosts a mobile theme camp: EE CAMP. EE creates parades and adorns mobile art, ceremony, and procession, appearing when and where by chance and when necessary, open to all HONK bands, wayward honk-a-teers, circussy types, and parade lovers.

name: El Circo and The Do Lab
description: El Circo and The Do Lab Present: Simpler Times….

name: Elders, The
description: “The Elders” are providing Brie, Bach, & Talk from 4:00 to 6:00 daily, except Wed. Join us for a snack of Brie, crackers, a glass of wine, some soothing music (not all Bach), and lot’s of conversation. Any time the “front door” is open you’re welcome to come in and sit, chat, draw, or just chill.

name: Electric Barbarella
description: Relax with us as we take a starship ride into a furry, laser-lit future filled with love, danger and adventure!

name: Elk Lodge: Flora & Fauna
description: Elk Lodge: Flora & Fauna is an all femaale reclamation of male-centric institutions- the evolution of the “old boy’s club”. All genders welcome to our feminist pub [expect adoration or heckling, depending on our mood].

name: Emergency Services Station 3
description: 3:00 Medical Station

name: Emergency Services Station 9
description: 9:00 Medical Station

name: Empress Rosa's Wedding Palace
description: Getting Married at BM???  Stop by Empress Rosa’s self-service Wedding Palace. Rings, certificates, seating for 20-30, legal wedding services available with prior planning.  Located within Terminal City.  Open 24/7  First Come, First Serve!

name: Energy Riders
description: YARR! The techno pirates known as the Energy Riders would be pleased to bring whomp to the dance floor. Pirate bar with pirate grog? We will make it so! Shade and comfort to relax in? Come join us! We like music that makes you want to dance. Come and dance so our pirates don’t get sad.

name: Entheon Village
description: The mission of Entheon Village is to demonstrate a future in which sustainability, ecological responsibility, environmental stewardship, and meditative and mystical consciousness are a welcomed and integrated part of society, and where art, spirituality and creativity is central to that vision.

name: Equilibrium
description: Come chillax and chat with the good peeps at Equilibrium.  Be sure to say hello to Michael.

name: eubie lemming's dive bar
description: Eubie Lemmings Dive Bar will be providing that perfect gift-cliff for your evolved self to jumpstart your burn. Also, don’t forget your photo op as Eubie Lemming!

name: Everywhere Land
description: Everywhere land is a collection of friends from Canada, the U.S., Australia and Italy. Drop by and visit everywhere!

name: EVILution ~ City Of Fallen Angels
description: EVILution ~ City of Fallen Angels Friday Night EVIL-steria Festival: A Masked carnival, enjoy goblets of red wine, entertainment, Laughing & Dancing…  Play Croquet threw our “Garden of Heathens”

name: evoLLLution: the Lively Loving Lot
description: The KKK evoLLLved:  The age of hate has ended and as a society we evolve beyond the Klu Klux Klan to become the Lively Loving Lot.  Come visit our Museum of the Tangled Bank ABC’s and join us for happy hour haunts spreading the Lively Loving Lot’s message of joy, peace & love & happiness!

name: EvoLOTION
description: Stop by EvoLOTION day or night for a self-serve helping of moisturizers and other creams. Sunscreen for the days. Heating lotion for the nights. Aloe for burns. And show up for our special events of full-service lotion application. Do you have some spare lotions? Email us or donate on the playa!

name: Evolution #9 Cafe
description: You say you want an evolution?  How about a cafe’ that offers coffee, newspapers & conversation by day and morphs into a Beatles-oriented blacklight Octopus’ Garden by night? Cafe’ hosted by Lucy, in the Sky, with Diamonds. Location: Nowhere, man. Come together, right now! All you need is…coffee!

name: Expansion Mansion
description: We chill and boogie out on inflatable things up like inner tubes, pool toys, and blow up dolls. In our pimped lounge area you can float on air, dance to a DJ, or read thought provoking books.

name: Extinct Creatures
description: Honoring those fallen off the Tangled Bank, and leading the Extinct Creatures parade Wednesday. Also daily reading aloud of Darwin’s Origin of Species.

name: Extreme Frequencies
description: Extreme Frequencies presents Tundra Bunny, a playa transport unit for all your dream destinations. Nightmare destinations available on request. LAND! AIR! SEA! SPACE!

name: Ezh Camp
description: We are the Ezh camp. We are Ezhiki  little hedgehogs. Come frolic with us in the forest of fun, chill with us in our norki and listen to our ezhik sounds. We will have fun games, a giant glowing Jenga, treats, and smiles and hugs for you.

name: F.U.N. Camp
description: F.U.N. (Fucked Up Nutrition) Camp has been part of Martini Village for the past 8 years.  Come imbibe with alcohol or not.  Refresh, revive, and repeat  bring your own cup!

name: FALLOUT SHELTER
description: Fallout Shelter Welcome and Escape the elements in our 16×32   Military tent while listening to rock music and have a cooool drink, YES, with ice. We light up the night with sound chasing lights and other eye candy. Enjoy spirits mixed by Frank and Jose,They make a Mean Playa Passion.

name: False Profit, LLC
description: As the most advanced company on the planet, False Profit’s most valuable asset is our brand.  By harnessing the full potential of our top secret american corporate technology, we will present an environment of delight that is guaranteed to throw the market into flux.

name: Fandango
description: The Fandando Village welcomes the return of Funkcamp, the crew who brought the Church of Funk to us in 2002.  We’ll have the live funk groove, as well as events like Bootie: Black Rock City and Backstage Pass!  And the Black Rock Broadcasting Corporation will be bringing it all to you live.

name: Fantasy Funhouse & Wheel of Karma
description: With all the excitement of a sideshow carnival.our performance stage will let everyone be a Star,providing interactive games to delight with all the thrills and spills for our bike friendly enthusiast !

name: FERN CAMP
description: FERN CAMP – full of Friendly E.R. Nurses, as well as many others who staff the REMSA Clinic tent. We are circled by aprons, hanging on the line. We don’t know why.

name: Fickleodeon
description: Fickleodeon will be fully mobile this year, bringing its brand of mercurial theater to every darkened corner of Black Rock City. Back at home, we’ll have shade. And drinkies!

name: Fire Conclave Convergence
description: Mandatory Check In point for all members of the Fire Conclave. Members of Controlled Burn welcome all members of the fire community. Great place to check out the fire activities on the playa. Ambient Drummers are welcome to join fire activities, BUT must check in before Thursday of the event.

name: First Transdimensional Bank+Church
description: Embracing the universal & ineluctable principle of EVOLUTION, our Bank has evolved into the First Transdimensional Bank+Church. FTB+C aims to elevate our philosophy of anti-commercialism & counter-profitability to the status of theological truth through the offering of numerous metafiscal services.

name: Fixxxation Station
description: Through the creative and concsious efforts of its members, Fixxxation Station arrives on the Black Rock Playa.  Thriving on a common goal of Community interactivity:  Fixxxation Station provides BRC with an environment That stimulates the senses and soul.  Doing so through interactive art, music, yoga, massage, conversation and libations.

name: Fiz Juice!
description: Are Mimosa’s just for brunch? Hell NO!… We’ve got DJ’s, a flowing Champagne and Juice bar, fire dancing, and freaks of fun just for your pleasure XOXOXO.

name: Flattery Camp
description: Flattery Camp returns to the neighborhood to unleash a contagion of flattery. Be flattered and/or join us in the fine art of flattery as the fabulous citizens of Black Rock pass by. We aim for sincerity, originality, humor, and comfort in the shade.

name: Free Movement Zone
description: The Free Movement Zone is bringing something extra to the Playa this year. Something you’ve never seen before! Forget everything you know about dance. Forget everything you know about poles. Operation Polegasm will change you ForEver! So come on over, grab a Pole, and have a Gasm!

name: Free Photography Zone
