description: Free Photography Zone has been photographing the participants of Burning Man in a studio setting since 1996 providing each person photographed with a print to memoralize thier time at BM.  Additionally a gallery of previous years photographs are displayed and given away at the end of each years BM.

name: Free Tribe-Tantra Temple
description: Holy sanctuary for beings awakening to oneness, tantric non-dual sacred space for open hearted lovers, shamanic ecstatic Kundalini dance, satsang, and yoga. Experience love-bliss bodily, move into seventh stage life with Master Free Lovelight Starseed Dreamdancer Shunyatananda Nataraja.

name: Freedom lounge
description: Freedom Lounge offers a list of Organic Spiritual freedoms including Alignments, removal of personal heaviness, dream interpretation, a cup of English tea, the best coffee you will ever have and great “Craic” (Gaelic for conversation) relaxing and comforting.

name: freedomcommunity
description: While there is no unifying credo or set of rules, there are some distinct themes that resound powerfully around/within freedomcommunity. They include, but certainly are not limited to: responsibility, honesty, integrity, freedom, complete communication, trust, community, love, play…

name: FreeStyle Palace
description: TripKnight and LawyersforBurners.com proudly announce their ensemble performance for Burning Man 2009: FreeStyle Palace: Evolution of the Black Rock City Allstars.  FreeStyle Palace 2009 will operate a sound stage featuring nightly hip hop shows with the Allstars from sunset to about 2:00 am nightly.

name: Frogma
description: Frogma is the little theme camp that could, where everyone is your friend and neighbor! Hop on over to our lily pads Monday through Thursday at 5:00pm for BRC’s one and only Hoppy Hour. Serving up ice cold slushy Frogaritas in our dome sweet dome. You’re guaranteed to make a rainbow of connections.

name: From Silks to Medicine Sticks
description: Stop by or stake your habitation at this homage to the eclectic world of wonder.  We encourage the aerial arts of silks, tissu, cord de lisse in additon to juggling in all its wondrous forms.  We will have many tools for these off-circus arts on hand, including rigging, but please also bring some.

name: Fun Cult, The
description: We exist to give and receive fun. Come because you see the potential of fun in everything and feel anger at nothing. We are strong supporters of hot cocoa, birthday cakes, hats, champagne, carefree dancing and loud guffaws. Check out www.thefuncult.org for future information on surprise parties.

name: Funky Town
description: Funky town will have live dj sets and plenty of yard games.  We will be working with the robot heart crew to provide plenty of fun and drinks for all day and night.

name: Furniture Car Rally Camp
description: Come one, come all, with your mobile furniture to the Furniture Car Rally! Meet us Thursday afternoon at 2:00 for fun, games, prizes, and, of course, to see tons of furniture on wheels.

name: Fusion Valley
description: Fusion Valley, home of the 3 headed cow… This year we’ll have couches, Internet Cafe, music, movies, painting, games, video arcade games and other fun activities under our carpeted shade. Silk Screening will be available too this year! We also have black light art, with many paintings on display.

name: G-Spot, The
description: “The G-Spot” is a diverse group of Burning Man explorers that have built an amazing community through similar mind-set & participation, with our mantra being “If you can’t find us, then you’re not coming”. Please come and enjoy our many pleasurable amenities, if you can find us!

name: Gallavant Goddesses & Lost Boys
description: The Gallavant Goddesses & their Lost Boys bring stability to the Playa by giving their fellow citizens BALLS. Located within Redirection Connection Village, sit in our inviting front yard while we supply you with a brightly colored tennis ball for your bicycle kickstand and lively conversation.

name: Ganeshs Transmutation Station
description: Ganeshs Transmutation Station helps burners overcome obstacles to spiritual/consciousness evolution.  Daily 11:30-4:30 Retreat from the Heat bar in a large, cool traditional desert tent from India.  Ganeshs Playa Ball court offers interactive tennis, volleyball, badminton… day and night (glow).

name: Garage Mahal
description: On the playa since 2001. Our art car, the Floating Palace of Pleasure has been bumpin funky beats on the Playa since 2002.  Relax to down tempo chill grooves in the afternoon before an evening on our art-car. Were an eclectic collection of individuals committed to spreading peace, love, and dance on the Playa as well as in our everyday lives.

name: Garden Chillicious, The
description: Live music experiments, cocktails and “do-it-yourself” chill garden are at your disposal.  Come by the Bhutanese dragon tent to get away from it all and enjoy an aesthetic experience both day and evening. Let us pamper you with footbaths, cocktails, and impromptu “appetizer happy hours”.

name: Garden of DeLights
description: In years past we’ve studied cultures – both foreign and familiar – as inspiration for theme camps such as Bollywood, Japanorama, La Dolce Vita, Sagrada and Home. This year, spurred by evolution, Dragon Debris will present a colorful effusion of illumination and texture, a Garden of DeLights.

name: Garden of Hedon
description: Our Garden of Earthly Delights; sonorous music, friendly folk, some natural and unnatural fauna. All fluidly maintained by our white picket fence of love, use it to proudly display your photo moments of burn love; that glance you caught, that kiss you saw, or those dusty hands holding each other

name: Gathering of the Sphere
description: the gathering of the sphere is a group of old and new burners alike, brought together on a quest to come together on our own small sphere within the context of the countless others that surround us.

name: GATO
description: GATO is a fun loving group hailing from San Francisco A ‘Family of Friends’ And when you come to our camp YOU are family!

name: Gay Rd Village
description: A think tank of evolution psychic that can transcend your concious and lead you back to your animal roots.  Learn what animal you evolved from and let our resident artist take you on a journey back to your roots by transforming your outer soul into the inner soul you once were with body paints.

name: Gedi Prime
description: We play with fire, do tricks for treats, take pictures of just about everything, then laugh some more. Stop on by & visit our wild west saloon! Warm your tush by one of our giant burn barrels and stand in AWE of the Great Theresa the nitrous demon!

name: Gender Blender
description: Boy? Girl? Ze? Unidentified? You decide. Come blend it up and explore gender while drinking smoothies. This theme camp is designed for gender blending newbies, long time gender benders, and those of us that just want to experiment. Enjoy safe space workshops, costumes, yoga, body sculpting, beverages, music & more!

name: Genesis
description: The Northwest is an ever-changing landscape of ever-changing beings. Where and how we originated we don’t truly know, but we must move forward with nature’s cycle. Come see how evolution has impacted wine, skin care, shade, and community from the land of rain in our space of old and new beginnings.

name: Genesis: The Creationist Bar
description: Serving cocktails by Intelligent Design, in honor of God’s 7 days of creation with themed drinks. Join us every day from 2:00 to 4:00 pm for a delicious and drunken journey through Genesis. Come sit and relax in the shade, while enjoying such drinks as “Let there be Light” or “Land and Sea”.

name: Genetic Mutant Petting Zoo
description: Come see, fondle, or alter our Genetic Mutant Petting Zoo, have a cocktail and listen to the evolution of music. Different Decade Dance party every night.

name: Genital Portrait Studio
description: At Genital Portrait Studio, highly trained photographers offer you the opportunity capture that special side of yourself in the privacy of our playa studio. Your session may include a number of props and positions, and you can walk away with your very own Genital ID card.

name: Get Nailed ~ Nail Painting Salon
description: Our goal is to add color to peoples lives through their nails. We know how grimey everyone’s nails get out on the playa during Burning Man. We would like to beautify hands throughout Black Rock City by offering nail painting. We will be open Tuesday through Friday from 5-7p (Sat 4-6p). DJ too!

name: Gigsville
description: Gigsville is supporting this year’s theme of Devolution by devolving into whatever it is that Gigsville has devolved into.  Please plan accordingly.

name: Gnome Camp
description: Gnome Camp is home to the Gnome Adoption Agency, where worthy parents receive an adorable garden gnome along with a disposable digital camera to record its adventures. Check out the gnome-capades on gnomecamp.com!

name: God Box
description: Sign the Oath of Secrecy, write in the Book of Confession, be purified by didjeridu and enter deep within the Lair of the Mystic Toad to open the mysterious God Box and reveal the secret contents within. The God Box has been providing equal opportunity mystical experience to BRC since 2003.

name: goddess wish camp
description: Goddess Wish Camp   for the playa goddess to come and get pampered shower shampoo shaving spanking orgasms anything

name: Golden Cafe
description: Your home for exotic cocktails, live music, and gourmet dining since 2003. Swing by for elegant libations served in real glassware, jam with our house band, work with our chefs to bring culinary wonder to the playa, store your wine in our refrigerated cellar, and visit the black rock vineyards!

name: good enough camp
description: Home of the candied bacon apple martinis. Come sample on Wednesday afternoon, play on our pole, or let us paint you up pretty. We’re good enough, and so are you!

name: Great Balls of Fire & Post Office
description: Hailing from the DC area and beyond, we offer several activities for your delight: sock poi making workshops, beginning poi spinning classes, hoop-making, beginner hoop lessons, a performance by members of the Playa Del Fuego Fire Conclave and more! Also a BRC Post Office 2.0 auxiliary mail drop.

name: Green Shamballah Camp
description: We are manifesting Green Shamballah as an Integrated, Activated and Organic society of spiritually centered beings, unified in Sacred Commerce and Collective Ritual as 1 people.  We feature Sustainable Technologies and Sacred Esoteric Teachings as the foundation for this esoteric society.

name: Green Tortoise Village
description: Green Tortoise = alternative travel entity. We operate the shuttle service to and from Empire and Gerlach and have a cool camp with shade, a chill area, and great folks from around the world. Come by if you have a bus problem, to check out our unique sleeper coaches or hop on board in San Francisco!

name: Greeters Camp
description: Greeters Camp

name: Grotto and Garden of Manifest Destiny, The
Gypsy Fleet
description: Ahoy there mates…this camp is where the Fishing Vessel (F/V) Gypsy Queen and its crew will dock, in between fishing periods of burner catch and release using our 100 fathom net. Come join us on the rolling playa, or celebrate your booty at our Gypsy Bar and Black Light Lounge.

name: Gypsy Witch Camp
description: Join the Gypsy Witches for our 10th year on the playa.  We have Salsa@Six and will be a meeting grounds for lesbians on the playa.  Check your What Where When for more info!

name: H.M.S. Beagle
description: The H.M.S Beagle is a whimsical version of Darwin’s vessel meeing Charles Schulz’s imaginary character’s Snoopy (the world famous beagle) with his faithful sidekick Woodstock and their adventure/voyage they will take thru the black rock dessert.

name: H.M.S. Nautitickle
description: DAAAARRRRRWIN based his darrrrned theories on our hairrrrry arrrrrsses. Lookin Farrrward to farrhh raughrrr   barghhh narr and drawrrr….        YAR!

name: Hair of the Dog
description: The premier blue-collar dive bar in all of Black Rock City, coupled with an open-mic stage where (almost) anything goes.

name: Hammock Hangout & RV[IP} Lounge
description: The Hammock Hangout is a giant 12,000 square foot passive solar shade structure with dozens of hammocks and an all day karaoke lounge underneath.

name: Hang-Out
description: Weary from trekking an unparalleled melange of earthly and heavenly beauty?  The Hang-Out is the place to recharge. Hammocks. Shade. Good company. Open all day and all night.  Just lay down!  Maybe you can Cum join us for a morning of naked erotica readings from the Birdcage. We scratch itches!

name: Happy Camp
description: This is HAPPY CAMP! We like to help people be HAPPAY!!!

name: Hardly Davidson Cafe
description: Hardly Davidson Cafe.  Stop by and have your bike cut/welded and modified to chopper status.  Have a drink and watch some classic biker flicks on the big screen.

name: Heaven's Ghetto
description: Heaven’s Ghetto, where working just good enough is a virtue.  Come enjoy the spiritual Teeter Totter of Death, let your inner tagger out on our Graffitti walls or chill our dome and smoke a hookah.

name: HeeBeeGeeBee Healers
description: HeeBeeGeeBee Healers is a grounded oasis providing nurturing healing services and education to the citizens of Black Rock City.  Stop by for some hands on work, take a class, or just absorb the serenity of our chill space.

name: HiLuxury
description: Come sit in the lap of luxury. The HiLux art car has now evolved into the ultimate advancement — HiLuxury and has upgraded its digs to the ultra luxurious Camp HiLuxury. Come for the glam and stay for the upscale real estate, Black Rock Michelin rated drinks and treats, and shark tank.

name: Hippocampus
description: Hippocampus is a memory making machine in your brain and on the playa.  Stop by and see what memories you can make.

name: Hokey Pokey Camp Man or Monkey
description: Hokey Pokey Camp Man or Monkey   Dance The Hokey Pokey at noon daily-Friends of Bill W. meeting at 5 daily.  Largest Take One Leave One north of the south pole. This is 24 hour Camp.  Everyone welcome.

name: Hollywood Death Squad, The
description: The American Wet Dream has evolved. This years gang of Canadian and American playa players are now a elite team of hardcore entertainment specialists who state with certainty that you will have fun, by force if need be. We offer real life non-stop reality TV style action centered around the 7 deadly sins for all to enjoy. Hollywood excess and TMI abound

name: Home Brew 4A Home Brew
description: A Home Brewers Community where brewers of the Playa can meet and share. Hand crafted beer, mead soda and wine all celebrated cold in the shade. Bring your home brewed keg and we’ll refrigerate, tap, give credit,discuss it and enjoy W/BRC. RSVP please. We are old school B.M. Open, community, low tech

name: Home Free Dome
description: Home Free Dome is an experimental community of encounter designed to accelerate and amplify the transformative cultural forces at play in Black Rock City. Come enter our technoshamanic machine for turning spectators into participants, veterans into virgins, and virgins into virtuosos.

name: Homeland InSecurity
description: Why evolve when you can regress? Thwart away those feelings of insecurity by getting your dose of complimentary compliments and affirmations.

name: Homeslice
description: Homeslice – A slice of Home

name: Honi Soit Croquet Club
description: Honi Soit is back on the playa to celebrate being banned from the Texas, Kansas, AND Arkansas school systems.  Our method of natural selection (cogitating cold can choices) truly demonstrates survival of the fittest!  Join the Order of the Garter for croquet, drinks, music, mist, and hat parties!

name: Hookah Homestead
description: Hookah Homestead is your place on the playa for an evening chill out and some puffs on the hookah.  Come chill out with us every night from 5-8 and select sunrise sets.  Unique flavors and good company!

name: Hookahdome
description: Hookahdome is your oasis in the desert — a friendly dome featuring shisha, conversation, exotic music, belly dancing and other live performances, and of course the magic you create with friends old and new.

name: Horny Camp!
description: Horny Camp: the fabulous interactive camp where you can make your own set of playa-horns.  We provide the clay, the gas oven, chill house beats, and shade in the mid day sun.  If you are already horny, thats OK, we can help you with that too!  Classes M-Th, 12PM-ish to 4PM-ish, unless were hangover in which case you never know

name: Huevos Ranch Eros
description: What came first, the chicken or the egg? Flock to Huevos Ranch Eros to hatch your own answer to this evolutionary debate. Play the Poultraphone (a rubber chicken organ), get a massage or Vortex energy healing, hatch yourself, or be transported to an ovular dimension in our giant glowing egg

name: Human Frolic Project
description: Human Frolic Project is all about kicking up your heels, forgetting the default world and embracing the freedom of Black Rock City. Our lounge will be hosting ‘Welcome Home’ parties, on Mon, Tues and Wed pm, with an open bar daily for playa sojourners needing a sip of strength. Corner of 6:00 & G

name: Humboldt Beauty Bar
description: Evolve into a Glamorous Being, adapted to feel good and look great on the Playa.  Our services, if you are lucky enough for them to be rendered, include massage, playa-hair, anti-chaffing powder, spray-downs and makeup.  Have a cocktail and beautify your playa evolution experience, Humboldt style…

name: Hushville
description: Hushville, an aural oasis in chaotic BRC, is open to any camper who pre-registers and can abide our three simple rules: 1) No generators; 2) no amplified sound; and 3) Leave No Trace. We are host to large, solo, theme, and non-theme camps, and residents from all parts of the US, Canada, and Europe.

name: I'm OK, You're OK Corral
description: Once again the Corral is “bringing it” to the playa.  The Corral is known for their camp hotties, and trust me they have alot up their sleeves for 2009.

name: Ice Cubed
description: Ice Cubed is the ice sales operation located in the 3-o-clock plaza. Crushed and block ice are available for $3 per bag or, a 6 pack of crushed at the discounted price of $15. Hours are Monday through Sunday from 9 am to 6 pm. Closed on Labor Day (ice sales in Center Camp will be open until noon).

name: Ice-9
description: Ice-9 is the ice sales operation located in the 9-o-clock plaza. Crushed and block ice are available for $3 per bag or, a 6 pack of crushed at the discounted price of $15. Hours are Monday through Sunday from 9 am to 6 pm. Closed on Labor Day (ice sales in Center Camp will be open until noon).

name: Ice-olution
description: We’re kicking off the week right!  On Tuesday between 1-3pm, come stop by for a tasty frozen mocha soy beverage.  You’ll never know how good these taste in the desert until you try one.  Don’t forget your cup!

name: Illumination Village
description: At 15 years old Illumination Village is probably the oldest village on the playa! We are an active, driven community of dedicated artists, technologists and fans of fire. We stoke the flames, mixing fire and steel, keeping your body warm at night, and your eyes twinkling with the glow of combustion

name: Image Node
description: Feel your mind blow as you manipulate the Seizuredome with its Magic Hamster Ball!  Drink tea with a mermaid in the Agnostic Science Reading Room! Shake it to live improvised electronic music and live mixed video from the usual mad scientists!  EVOLVE, DAMMIT, EVOLVE!

name: Immaculate Temple of Kreation, The
description: Prophets convert heretics to Kreationism, a belief that Burning Man has never happened before. Inside the Temple Konfessional believers confess their sins and are baptized by a Holy Bucket of The Immaculate. The newly annoited are invited to drink the Blood of The Man at our Bar of Resplendent Truth.

name: In Dust We Trust
description: Sharing and Square Dancing.

name: IncendiaryIntent
description: A group of artists who explore and document the fine art of playing with fire.  We specialize in capturing that moment of glee that comes with lighting a burst of fire.

name: Insomniac Cafe
description: the camp will be a comfy lounge and bar for people from everywhere to connect and mingle.

name: Interaction Cafe
description: At the Interaction Cafe we do not serve food or drinks  we serve interactions. Perhaps you’d like to start off with a casual conversation for an appetizer, engage in an interactive game for an entree and end with a song for dessert while you drink in the moment.

name: introspectacle
description: Introspectacle camp is where you can imprint on the outside what has evolved on the inside. Play with your inner creatures! Art panels, paintings and dust imprints evolve or devolve, as you wish. Make new creatures with our magnetic heiroglyphic transfer imprinter.

name: Iron Rose
description: Too much techno?  Not enough Fire?  Iron Rose answers with alternative music and fire of our own for you to set by.  …did someone say bluegrass?

name: Island of the Lost Cupcakes
description: The Island of the Lost Cupcakes is the home of the Sqysh Fysh mutant vehicle, and various Klowny Shenanigans

name: JellyBelly
description: Floating through a field of glowing coral, you are drawn to the pulsing blue-green bioluminescence of the belly of the jellyfish. Climb up its tentacles, become enmeshed in its tangled digestive webs, and leave as a transgenic human, tagged with fluorescent genes of the jelly and the corals.

name: Jerk Camp
description: This way there be Jerks.

name: Jingleheimer
description: Jingleheimer invites you to join us in the celebration of dance & sound. Daily jam sessions open to all musicians, and nightly performances from live bands, visual artists, DJ’s.

name: JOBI Playground Games
description: JOBI: Playground Games Evolve! Find your inner schoolyard superstar! Recess is in! Enjoy playground classics like tetherball, foursquare, hopscotch, volleyball, leapfrog, kiss chase, duck duck goose, and many more. Bring a team or come play alone. Rules will be evaluated on a second-by-second basis.

name: Journey's
description: Spiritual journeys, readings, healings and dream interpretations are what you can experience when you visit our theme camp. Let’s not forget about the sno-cones! Sno-Cones offered daily! Come cool off and be refreshed in spirit and body!

name: Jub Jub's Plastic Circus
description: aMonkey’srEvolution. Does what seems to have changed only a rePresentation of the familiar?  Is the mud on the stone rolling down the hill changing the course of the universe or only a reassignment of location for a continued oeuvre? No matter how far the poo gets flung is anything really different for the monkey?  Jub Jub, one of your favoritely familiar of monkeys wonders perhaps that the more things change the more they stay the same.

name: Just Show Up Camp
description: Traveling solo and tired of being far from the action? Want to camp closer to the esplanade or are you loner who wants to make new friends? “Just Show Up Camp!” is for individuals traveling solo who would like to “Just Show Up” and camp together without the usual formalities of a theme camp.

name: K-Svert 106.5FM Radio & Stage
description: K-Svert 106.5 FM provides the good citizens of Black Rock City a voice, a venue, an outlet for creativity in the form of not only radio waves, but also a professional quality performance stage that is open to any and all who wish to share their talents with the masses. K-Svert is your spot on the radio dial to keep in touch with the happenings in our fair city. At night the stage comes alive with performance, shadow dancing, artistic visuals and spectacle. A feast for the eyes and ears! Located on the Esplanade, look for the 50 foot broadcast tower.

name: Kamera Sutra
description: Bring your kamera and take your picture (along with your Burner buddies) with your faces in painted panels depicting the top five Kama Sutra positions (as voted on by the camp providers). See how you look in a new position you might like to try (thats Evolution) or if it looks familiar, refresh your memory for another go soon.

name: KAmp kaLE
description: Why Kale? Because it’s good for you. green beverages in the afternoon with minimal techno to jazz the soul.

name: Kamp Kammaniwannalaya
description: Kamp Kammaniwannalaya is a loose knit group of friends and family that enjoy and share the love of life and all it has to offer. We try our best to give back to the community all the joys we have recieved over the years.

name: Kamp Suckie Fuckaye
description: Kamp Suckie Fuckaye! Home of the Official Black Rock City Garnish fire conclave and the Suck and Fuck Saloon. Ground zero for KSF The Search For Neptune! Drink water… Suckie Fuckaaaaaaye!

name: Kanuckistan Research Station
description: Sexy gnarly science for make benefit glorious nation of Kanuckistan.  “omne ignotum pro magnifico” — “everything unknown appears magnificent”  Featuring Porno the Clown’s Super Sex Freaks Side Show, Old Country Vodka Snorting Bar, 5th annual Xeni Cup street hockey tournament.  twitter.com/KRS7

name: KaPilina
description: 1)Ka Pilina is the Hawaii Regional Camp.  Come here if you’re a Hawaii Burner, or want to know Hawaii Burners!  Potluck luau on Friday.

name: Karma Chickens, The
description: Karma Chickens are all about sharing knowledge and experience!  We grill delicious meals and serve refreshing drinks in our 25-foot dome. We teach juggling, swing dancing, belly dancing, grey water management, conduct pillow fights, paint, play acoustic and amplified music and more!

name: Kegel Kamp and Jewelry Exchange
description: Exercise your PCs!  Can you peg the Kegel-O-Meter?  New this year: Kegel Pong Video Game!  Compete for valuable bragging rights!  Exchange a piece of jewelry or just stop by for some tea.

name: Kentucky Fried Camp
description: This will be the second year for Kentucky Fried to liven the mornings with Bourbon, Moonshine and our delicious smoked, fried Baloney Sandwiches. We served over 2000 last year. What better way to start your day than getting Fried the KFC way! Starting 9 AM each day.

name: KidsVille
description: KidsVille is THE place for children of all ages. We are a group of diverse families creating a unique space for play and other activities. Families with children 0-17 years of age are welcome to camp with us if they are pre-registered. Registration deadline is August 1st, 2009.

name: Kimchi Camp
description: Kimchi Camp 2009 – Now with more kimchi!  Heard of kimchi? Kimchi is a korean dish similar to sauerkraut but better tasting and smelling. Its ingredients are varied but it is always fermented. Come visit us for a DIY guide to making your own and maybe sample some if you dare.

name: kink'os
description: Get a postcard made and mailed while you hang out in our fun and spanky camp!

name: Knarly Carnival
description: The Knarly Carnival is back again this year with our Big Moroccon Tent, a great shade from the sun and cool place to hang out and of course The Ice Cold Hard Cider, not to forget the smoked turkeys and soup!

name: Kostume Kult
description: In NYrvana Village, visit our Mutation Station kostume dome.  Transformations by day, absurdity around the clock. Video, performances & evolutionary art. Costume recycling with your help (on playa or email us.).  Costuming the naked since 2001…

name: Krewe of Papa Legba
description: The Krewe of Papa Legba will provide on-playa text messaging and LIMITED cellular service over parts of BRC.  If you are interested in “community telephony” (or just want to see what a hand-crafted cellular base station looks like) please stop by for a visit.

name: L.E.D.'ers of the rEvolution
description: We are highly evolved Canadians with our kids and we are here to light up the night.

name: LAFer Camp
description: Yes, the Lazy Ass folks are back again! We will not let GWB’s recession kick our lazy asses! We’ll have some familiar LAFers and some virgins LAFers. So come by, hang out, and show us your lazy ass. You’ll be glad you did and so will we (|)

name: Lamplighters
description: Lamplighters Village – Come help us light the city any or every night at 5pm.

name: Landing Strip
description: The Landing Strip is a full service airport and lounge where you can cool your jets and earn your wings. Let our crew top off your tank while you lounge. When the weather keeps you grounded, that’s when the party takes off! Guest DJs will be flying cool grooves daily with occasional nightly service.

name: Lava Lounge
description: The Lava Lounge is a volcanic experience with lava, magma, and eruptions. Relax at the bar with a sip of volcanic punch, dance under the melting lava, be seduced by the erupitve forces of Mt. Luscious, or just enjoy the shade the shadow of the volcano casts by day.

name: Le Kafι
description: LE KAFΙ welcomes you during day light for a cup of fair trade, organic and carbon neutral ethipian coffee or south african tea. Come chill-out, enjoy yoga classes, board games, petanque competitions, and much more…!

name: Lenny Camp
description: Come visit the now legendary Pope Lenny O The Playa and his loyal minions as they wreak their very special brand of havoc from the friendly confines of Lenny Camp, situated within Redirection Connection Village. We’re the secret substance that holds it all together…..come see how!

name: Leopard Martini Lounge
description: We are leopards of all ages.  Come join us for martinis that are as dry as the playa!  Serving Black Rock City since 1998.

name: Leopardy Lair
description: Calling all Smartypants, Fact Freaks, Triviaholics, and the men & women who love them:  Its Leopardys 3rd blockbuster year!  Group Quiz & Quaff — 2:00-3:00; Leopardy! Game — 3:00-4:00, Wednesday-Saturday. Wear puss print and bring the most underutilized organ at BRC — your BRAIN!

name: Lil Bastards
description: The name says it all

name: Lil Town
description: Look for the line of beautiful rocking chairs. There you will find ice cold sweet tea and canasta – the best card game known to man. Come chill out in our shade. As you enter our town you will be given a name tag and be treated as our life-long friend. This is where you belong, this is where you want to stay and relax. Come sit on our front porch!

name: Liminal Labs - Amino Acid Arcade
description: Come witness the origin of life! Step up to Amino Acid Arcade. Pit yourself against games of chance & natural selection. Try your luck, head back to the bar-cade, “Origin of the Specious & enjoy submitting to our utterly random, slightly humiliating (and possibly titillating) DIY genetic sequencing.

name: Liquid Latex Lounge, The
description: The Liquid Latex Lounge is pleased to offer another year of memories. Latex body paint with designs from tame to outrageous. Open all week, we love to trade stories and ideas for paint. Bring a friend and we will show you how to transform them.

name: Local 33.333 Sound Camp
description: LocaL 33.333 Sound Camp. a sound system-free camp in HUSHville for Cafe Sound Lead technicians, JK Sound crew & other sound contractors who like being able to sleep at night.

name: Lollipop Shot Camp
description: Lollipop Shot Camp! This camp has evolved and now is a result of Natural Selection. “Survival of the Fittest” is our theme. Our glow in the dark shot glass has “mutated” and Darwin would be proud.  Shot Party celebrating your “personal evolution” on Thursday 6-9pm. Evolution playa wear encouraged.

name: Lost Boys, The
description: For the third year in a row The Lost Boys are back on the playa! This year we bring you the usual, and a NEW 30 foot teeter totter, as well as a sound system to get your feet movein, a flower garden oasis to help you beat the heat, and a grand piano.

name: Lost Penguin Cafe, The
description: What could be more lost in the desert than a Penguin? Only you aren’t lost, you’ve just found the place you are looking for! Drop in and enjoy our shade, couches, wine, chocolate, friendly people and good times. Night and day there is always something or someone interesting at The Lost Penguin!

name: Love Knot
description: Representing loves evolutionary commitment to time, a Celtic inspired structure where 2 paths will become 1. Join us for the celebration Thurs o9o3o9 at dusk where after a short ceremony we will be hosting a party for all. Everyone welcome. Dress:Think Renaissance meets Mad Max From:Vancouver Canada

name: Love Potion Camp
description: Love Potion Camp welcomes you to a chill space full of art, creativity, whimsy, fun, family, positive vibes and Luurve. This is a non-sexual space but cuddling and BIG hugs are welcomed and encouraged.

name: Love Puddle Playground
description: We are what you always wished a playground would be.  Complete with a bar, Love Puddle Playground offers kick-ass punch, tether ball, four square, detention, dildo jousting contests, and best of all, hugs.  “The bar is open!”

name: Love to Bone
description: We are an art camp with a health outreach sideline we have constructed a (more durable) inflatable dome about 35 feet high, up as weather permits (usually limited, and only at night), and a sunset to sunrise light up disco floor. The health outreach part: 24/7 condom bar… please take up to ten.  🙂

name: Love-U-Lopian (Tube)
description: Small group of friends who firmly believe in the robot army, apocalypse training, hummus love and of course, vaginas. Stop by our camp and enjoy some mimosas and hummus and our very popular, notorious even, cunt coloring book.

name: LOVELUTION
description: Inspiring Evolution through Love. Modern mystics and hedonistic monks offer a metaphysical nexus of contemplation and rejuvenation within a grounded and peaceful environment, inspiring evolution that will last long after the dust has settled.

name: Low-Key
description: We are a loose collection of artists and performers from NYC. Stop by and bring us a cocktail!

name: Lustre Village
description: 24hour village dedicated to PLAY. Home to Glittercamp, the Glitterbox 24 hour bar and groove station, Cosmic Recess, Chai Lovecamp – and proudly welcoming CostCo soulmate trading outlet for 2009! Daily glittering by Glittercamp, find your soul mate at CostCo, Cosmic Recess playground

name: Mad Flava!
description: Mad Flava brings you big playa taste, from your tounge to your feet, through Jonny & the Ho’s mobile noodle cart to the 3rd annual BRC 5k run(Thurs 8am Center camp), well make the Atkins diet our bitch while satiating your need for speed.

name: Mage Camp
description: We are a group of Mages dedicated to evolution and comfort.  To that end, our camp offers from snacks and breathing cloths to seminars on divination and meditation.

name: Mansonian Institute, The
description: The Mansonian Institute explores the questions: Was The Man created or did he evolve over the years?  How does he get to the Playa?

name: Margarittaville
description: Tropical paradise comes to BRC.  Stop by and enjoy a cold margaritta in a tropical setting complete with music, misters, plenty of good company and fun.  Grab the mic and sing along if the mood hits you.  The Tiki Bar is expected to be open 12 noon til 6 pm.

name: Martini Village
description: Welcome to the next step of natural selection!  Here you will find a plthora of activities with Martini Lunches, lollipop-alcoholic natural selections, carbon based libations, swimsuit parties with contests and conseling on the future and the past.  Stop in, say hi and explore your own evolution.

name: Math Camp @ Group W
description: Math Camp, a safe place for Mathematics. A small, social camp, we offer a place to drink and derive! Home of the Fabulous Electric Cupcakes. Purveyors of crunchy snacks. The Best Friday Morning Sunrise Cocktail Party on the Playa.

name: McMoney&Drugs
description: Would you like fries with that? Stop bye for a Sharkfin Burger or Child Labor shake! McMoney&Drugs, opening soon in a desert near you!!

name: Meanderthals
description: Meanderthals- “Survival of the Fittest, caveman style”.  Come battle it out physically with the “Caveman Joust” or mentally with “Giant Jang-off”, and find out if you have what it takes to evolve.

name: Media Mecca
description: Media Mecca is the point of contact for all professional media covering the event. In most cases media will have preregistered but some on-site registration is available.

name: Medusa
description: Medusa is an open, fun and creative space dedicated to everything Jellyfish… Join us as we celebrate the creature that found its evolutionary groove over 650 million years ago. Activities taking place in our pulsating “Jellie Bloom Dome” include the Ms. Medusa Pageant, afternoon tea dances & more.

name: Metamorph
description: Three simple three-sided wooden pyramids in a triangular orientation which will be built upon, interconnected, and decorated over the course of the week with lumber, found materials, and fabrics. This will essentially “evolove” over the week as people add onto it, going along with the main theme.

name: Midnight Poutine
description: Direct from Montrιal, Quιbec, the Black Rock Poutine Company presents an amazing Quιbec delicacy that has to be tasted to be believed.  We combine the awesome powers of french fries, gravy, and cheese curds into the ideal late night snack.  Come get some!

name: Midnight Ridazz
description: Roll into the Midnight Ridazz camp for bike blessings from our ordained ministers, maintain your locomotive self-sufficiency with mentored DIY bicycle repair, join us on organized bicycle tours, and stick around for some sexy, sexy bike talk.

name: MidNite Popcorn Palace, The
description: The triumphant return of The MidNite Popcorn Palace! We’re Back! Serving-up fresh hot popcorn to the people. The Popcorn Palace first appeared on the Playa in ’99’ as a mobile pushcart. In ‘2000’ ‘2001’ & ‘2004’ we were a theme camp. This year we Evolve into a theme camp and mobile popcorn service.

name: Mind Shaft Society
description: The Mind Shaft Society is a collaboration of artistic scientists. We go on an Expedition every winter, then recreate and present the findings at Burning Man every year.

name: Ministry of the Magical Mustache
description: The smallest yet most expressive piece of facial hair. The classic disguise. The brother of the monocle. The cousin of the soul patch. The perfect accompaniment to the mystery of man. Signaling to the world that something is hidden but hinted. Concealed and yet revealed. Close your eyes and remember the magic of play and the power of possibility.

name: Miracle Fruit Camp
description: Miracle Fruit Camp brings a “taste-full” element to BRC. Think cold, fruity, refreshing sweetness falling from the sky and into your mouth during the hottest part of the day while being fanned, spritzd and told how wonderful you are by pleasant pranksters wearing Carmen Miranda hats.

name: Mischief Camp
description: Here to serve for our 5th year, welcome to Mischief Camp! Mischief Camp is the only spot on the Esplanade to feature live video feeds from across the playa. Come look for yourself and see parts of the city youve never seen before.  Come play our shocking reaction & skill games. Out on the town looking for something to do? Bring your friends over to Mischief Bar.

name: MiscreAnt Hill
description: In the theory of evolution MiscreAnt Hill aims to take the communal camp experience to the next level by manufacturing a unique canvas shade structure to focus our antics under one rooftop. We bring the music, the weird, and the creativity, all in the spirit of MisAdventure.

name: Mission Country Club
description: Savor the flavors of San Francisco’s Mission district out on the playa….Pretentious coffees interspersed with greasy gorditas, high octane sangria, Latin Beats and cheap Mexican beer. And don’t miss our 5th Annual Sangria SoundClash Party on Thursday @ 4:20 for bottomless Sangria and Latin beats.

name: Modern Religion, The
description: Scientology, a truly new and modern religion for the 21st century, comes to Black Rock City to demonstrate techniques proven to help one overcome the problems of our every changing world. No matter the problem, something can be done about it.

name: Mohammeds Mini Martini and Erotica
description: When the sun reaches its zenith and is beating down on the citizens of Black Rock City, head over to the coolest Bedouin Palace on the playa and relax with an ice cold martini while lounging on pillows and poufs. Peruse our book of true erotic stories and if the spirit moves you write one yourself.

name: Moist
description: MOIST returns participatory plaster casting to the playa! Visitors to our camp will be the molds by which this year’s plaster effigy evolves.

name: Mondo Spider
description: The Mondo Spider camp is devoted to those who warship 8 legged walking machines. Come by for a drink and join the ritual as we unleash the Mondo Spider every day at sunset.

name: MonkeyNutz
description: Monkey around the whole day long, its time to get bananas with MonkeyNutz!  Our Jungle Dome welcomes you to join us for beats….dance, laughter, drumming, coconut beverages, vine swinging, loin cloths….and a baseline.

name: Monticello
description: The Wigs welcome you to our home, Monticello, an epicenter of unbridled debauchery, pseudo-aristocratic absurdism, unfathomable sexiness, and pantaloon-shaking madness.

name: Moonbow Camp
description: When the Full Moon shines upon Yosemite Falls, the Moonbow there, creates a special place of quiet reflection that represents America’s great parks and Nature. We’re campers and activists that will have quiet space, yoga, crystal singing bowls, a gay pride parade for todays evolving gay community.

name: Moonrock
description: After focusing on integrated theme camps for many years, Moonrock has decided to expand its field of vision and bring the playa a spectrum of smaller wonderful units: an interactive and multifunctional art vehicle, community workshops, bad ideas, and a fierce dedication to heckling and shenanigans.

name: Mootopia
description: Graceful grazing lands for a modest myriad of mootopians and whomever might meander by, we nestle next to blazing daytime beats and roam in search of nighttime feats, always eager to wander into the great moo yonder and discover delicious adventures for all.

name: Mothers of InVENTion
description: This camp is like talking to your mom, only with more laughs and less guilt. Join these smart, sassy apron-wearing moms for some lemonade and cookies and chat about love, life and bucket lists.  Take home a self-decorated ”bucket-list-on-a-bag” or help with our “Evolution of the Bra” art project.

name: Mudskipper Cafe
description: They came from Sea to Land, from the Uncharted Depths of Lake Lahotan, to the open Playa just to serve you frosty cold beverages! The Mudskippers will be serving primordial beverages and Fortune Readings at the Mudskipper Cafe, and at Camp Celestial Bodies Bar!

name: Museum of Unnatural History
description: Believe the unbelievable! Explore the unexplored! View fantastic alternative lifeforms in relative safety! Bring a cup. The Museum of Unnatural History. Mutate now, avoid the rush.

name: Museum of Unnatural Selection, The
description: The Museum of Unnatural Selection is a museum style diorama built within the staple building block of industrial art spaces – a 20′ shipping container.  A sensual cornucopia of interactive fire, sound, light, and metal sculpture; the museum contains sculptural elements that represent an alternative evolutionary perspective.  A life-sized tree, an ethereal woman, animals, fish, flowers, pond and stream invoke many questions.  What could be?  What might not have been?  What almost never was?  From afar you merely see a box in the distance.  Fire, light and sound emanate, but what lies inside?  You arrive to find that in this unnatural universe it is you that controls the light, sound, fire, and creatures.  A museum unlike any you have visited before.  Created by 90% recycled materials at NIMBY by a group of artists and volunteers who know its better if you make IT together.

name: MUTANT ALIEN BEAUTY SPA
description: The MUTANT ALIEN BEAUTY SPA is a camp at Burning Man. FACE and BODY PAINTING will be done by an artist who has been trained in womens airbrush make up. Anything from GEISHA with Lotus Blossoms to RAGING FLAMES and ‘realistic’ ALIEN skins will be offered, and a variety of face designs and masks.

name: Mutant Bikology Camp
description: Featuring members of Portland’s finest bike-club, Zoobomb, providing Bike Fun to the citizens of Black Rock City. Ride our mutant bicycle creations, compete in our BRC Bike Fair (Wednesday), and learn to ride the Tall-bike obstacle course.

name: Mutant Mo's Last Chance Saloon
description: Mutant Mo’s Last Chance Saloon! The most dangerous bar in the universe. No one will look twice at that third arm here, partner. Hey, sometimes even a mutant wants to go where everyone knows its name.

name: Mutation/Creation
description: Come play in our garden of mutations!

name: Mystikal Misfits
description: Mystikal Misfits have been on a global journey, observing, identifying, collecting, cataloguing and experimenting with earthly specimens in order to unlock the mysteries of evolution. We are creating our own evolutionary designs to speed up progress. Our camp is our workshop and museum of our work.

name: N-Gon Fishin' 2009
description: The N-gon returns for 2009, evolving to breathe playa dust during the dry months of the year. The Playafish once more sets out to roam Black Rock City, while the camp continues to offer interactive games and activities suitable for all participants.

name: N.I.P.S.
description: Nipple Inspection and Placement Station. Coming tp BRC to further advancements in the science of nipple classification. How do your nipples stand up? Come by to have your nipples evaluated for type and class. Nipple coverings will be given as needed while supplies last.

name: Naked Ninjas
description: Our sneakniess is something to be seen! Come by on Monday or Thursday afternoon for an afternoon libation in the shade and check out the debut of the Purple People Eater mutant vehicle while it is in playa-dock.

name: Nectar Village
description: Nectar Village is about you. It is about what you need to survive, refuel, and revitalize. Mind, body and spirit are all served, and youll find the nectar you seek for any of them, in the camps at our oasis. Offerings continuously from 8am to 10pm.

name: nevada barbarians
description: we are at best, we are a group of locals that love the desert and love to have fun, we welcom everone with open arms. so come party like a barbarian if can hang. so come have a beer, or a shot, or just listen to some cool tunes. come see what we are all about.

name: Neverwas Haul
description: See previous

name: New Jersey
description: New Jersey HEY go F%?& yourself!  Jersey’s known for it’s unique style of hospitality, and we welcome all travelers. Stop by, hang out in our pyramids, tell us a story – just don’t ask us what exit we’re from. Fuggeddaboutit!

name: New Warrior Camp
description: New Warrior Camp:  Sacred magical space for new warriors and their friends.

name: NEXUS
description: Nexus brings it home once again. Drink specials all day, with the best beats on the playa to match. Laughs, friends and a booty shaking good time. lots shade, 3 domes, and 30,000 watts of earth shattering bass!

name: Nice Nice
description: Come visit, party, get misted and take photos of your friends as they evolve as part of our evolution mural. Also take rides on our 4 person, 4 wheel peddle cart.

name: Ninjas and Beer...
description: Ten years ago, a ninja commando unit was sent to prison for a crime they didn’t commit. These ninjas escaped from a maximum security prison and now survive as soldiers of fortune. If you have a problem, if no one else can help, and if you can find them, maybe you can hire…Ninjas and Beer!

name: non-Prophets, Discorporated
description: The non-Prophets DJs will be performing IDM, electro, industrial, psytrance, and downtempo dance sets while VJ Mad Doktor projects psychedelic visuals.  Join us at night as we spin staff, poi, and other LED toys in the comforting glow of the Pyramid of Light.

name: Northwest Mist
description: Providing a soothing Northwest atmosphere to escape the mid-day heat, step through the Northwest Mist portal and transcend the heat of the day for a momentary refreshening. We are also the home of the ghost of The Lady Washington residing in the Redirection Connection Village.

name: Nose Fish
description: Camp Nose Fish returns in 2009 to present two new theme-related interactive projects: Tree of Life and Superhero Evolution.  We’ll help you evolve into the superhero you are by helping you create your own costume, and at night you control a 15 foot tree of light with your fingers.

name: Nothing Works
description: New dome!  Bar, lounge, hammocks!  Non-stop aural refreshment–a soundscape of a variety of species–from jb to john phillip sousa.  Marshmallows.

name: NYC Container Camp
description: NYC Container Camp is the New York container filled with all the love, joy, art and creativity shipped from the other side of the country! Come get your goods and sit awhile for our evening drinks while putting together your bikes and art and maybe even play mailbox baseball!

name: NYrvana Village
description: An urban oasis with NY based Kostume Kult and Squid Row with PRED from East Davis, CA.  Daytime kostume dome transformations with interactive art, absurdity and activities on both the Esplanade and Avenue A. See camp listings for more…

name: Oakltopia Oaktopuss, The
description: Come join your friends in an oasis.  We offer multiple colors of toenail & fingernail polish.  Come decorate yourself to your heart’s content with body & face painting. Please sit in our shade, chill with some great people, & make a few new friends.

name: Oasis 47
description: Oasis 47 is a collective of 7 interactive camps including – Oasis 47 Pendant Making Station & EL Wire; the Deadly Muppets: Pirate Crawl, 40′ Stupa for Prayers; Limulus Polyphemus: Horseshoe Art Car rides; ChainsawMargaritaGuys: frothy chainsaw margaritas,  Ninja Knead: Karen Burmese Massage Workshops

name: Oasis Camp
description: Oasis camp provides water, lemonade and other liquids during our daily siestas throughout the week as well as a cool, welcoming place to relax. Also make sure to come by for our Maritime Ball!

name: obno X ious
description: Come get annoyed at obnoXious , the most irritating camp on the Playa. We will be serving up a late night cacophony of squawking techno and blasting annoyance through our stadium bullhorns. Climb our tower and grab the mic if you have something important for the city to hear. We know you all do.

name: Ocean's Serene
description: Retreat from the heat and the dust inside Ocean’s Serene Luxury Spa @ Stardust Lounge Casino. Pamper your skin with a rejuvenating seaweed facial mask, beautify your body with a unique temporary tattoo, or simply hang out for some nautical arts & crafts with our lovely mermaids and saucy sailors.

name: Oden's Eye Apple Cider
description: Organic cider and other related activities from the wild woods of Northern California: the Raven flies, the great Elk bellows, and Apples hang from laden Trees.  Drink and make merry for the Fenris Wolf draws nigh!

name: OMCC
description: OMCC is the Object Manipulation Concentration Camp where spinners and jugglers can be found all day and night honing their craft and teaching their skills.  Workshops every day and drop in lessons any time on poi, staff, hoop, balls, clubs, fans, you name it.

name: Oobleck
description: Oobleck invites you to challenge your senses! Play with oobleck, a non-Newtonian fluid made from corn starch and water – it drips down your arm but won’t splash when punched. Oobleck hangs with Tasty Noodles, a fabulous desert party crew packing a bar, amplified sound and misters.

name: Opulent DETH Temple
description: Dark, Sleazy, and Alcohol-Fueled.  We’re still slinging bloody marys this year but not quite so goddamn early!

name: Opulent Temple
description: Sacred Dance to world class dance music.  Why sacred?  We hope you touch Spirit on the dance floor, to kiss eternity on the lips to help you have courage to fight injustice.  Or at least to make you horny and a better dancer.  Art made by the camp members for the community. And NO, we don’t pay dj’s.

name: Otter ReEvolution #9
description: Otter ReEvolution #9 is an oasis of love and conscious celebration.  This is the 15th year in a row in which we, the Otter Clan, bring our love, laughter and fancy pants dancing to Burning Man.  Viva La ReEvolution!

name: Outpost23
description: Outpost23 – We demand rigidly defined areas of doubt and uncertainty! Oh yeah – and Psytrance Is Not Art!!

name: Overmind
description: Overmind. A place to remember your hidden past and prepare for your journey into the future of human consciousness. Come during the day and we’ll “space out” your costume for your voyage through the cosmos. Come at night we’ll be telling danceable audio-visual stories about origins and destinations.

name: Pan's Garden
description: A cool heathen oasis, we at Pan’s Garden provide organic garden lessons, libations, and brilliantly painted canvases with bright LED lighting. Whether you need tips for wiring solar panels, suggestions on running drip systems & compost for your home gardens, or a drink in the shade -come visit us!

name: Pancake Playhouse
description: Pancakes and soft rock: two great tastes that taste great together

name: Pandora's Lounge & FixIt Shoppe
description: Stuff breaks at Burning Man.  Come fix it at Pandora’s Fit It Shoppe.  We will have available basic materials and tools for repairing bikes, costumes, Mohawk hair cuts, fire spinning gear or whatever.  Enjoy some liquor at the lounge while waiting for your friends to finish fixing their stuff.

name: PANGEA
description: Camp Pangea is Place where all the evolution of the old and new worlds unite. A place where all people of colour creed and culture can come together as one in union and place their very own journey of evolution through our unique PANGEA map. A place where cultural diversity will touch all the senses.

name: Paradise Motel
description: Paradise Motel is a hotel “off Route 666”; kitchy 60’s hotel off of a highway. We’re adding a mutant animal zoo, which is a cheesy “roadside attraction” style exhibit of mutant animals, which are stuffed animals sewn together in truly unnatural ways. Sno-kones will be given out during the day.

name: Party Naked Tiki Bar
description: Serving cold Tiki punch to BRC residents, aged 21+ only, in a cool relaxing clothing optional environment. You dont have to remove your clothes to enjoy this nudist bar. Come by for event schedule then for happy hour, you may get leid, and party with us. Be LNT friendly and bring your own cup.

name: Pee Funnel Camp
description: We are a full service Pee Funnel Camp, dispensing Pee Funnels to ladies (or gentlemen) at any time of day or night!  Pee Funnels allow ladies to easily stand and pee or aim into a jug.

name: People's Art Congress (PAC)
description: Feeling a little sinister, some hatred and despair? Adultery, debauchery, ya weve all been there. Incest, lust and greed, all the evils that we do, Soon to become the Portrait of Dorian, But is it Dorian, or is it you?  Artists are invited to create the Portraits of Dorian.

name: PERFECT WORLD, THE
description: Welcome to the camp THE WORLD COMPLETES, it is all the team of of the Frenchburners which will be happy to receive you pays to share unforgettable moments, activities will have the place for game of petanque, the chanted singing(song), the pastis and the same breakfast offered to the visitors…

name: Persian Excursion
description: Kick up your feet and recharge your adventurous spirit in our extra cool and shady oasis while enjoying henna art, chilled Moroccan mint tea, misting bottles, and Turkish tobacco.

name: Petting ZOO
description: Petting ZOO welcomes newcomers and only hopes to share the experiences of the playa all while offering an array of creative cocktails, ice-cold bubbling brew, imbibing beverages, and our classic and exclusive ‘moon juice’.  Daytime Only. 21 and Over. Donations Accepted.

name: PEX
description: PEX returns with that invisible vibe. We will be back with the stage, shade structure with daily yoga classes and Arche-Dream for Humankind.

name: Phage, The
description: In 2009’s Darwinian spirit, True Prophet is reborn as The Phage, an homage to the vast dark ecology whose foment gave birth to Earth’s living diversity. These ubiquitous viral lifeforms evolve faster than any other life on earth. TP scientists will evolve your minds with workshops and dancing.

name: Philadelphia Experiment Village
description: The Philadelphia Experiment Village is a Community of Camps representing a broad range of international influences. We are uniting the Original PEX Camp with Putt Putt Playa (PPP), Camp Chillax (Los Angeles) The Museum of Unnatural History (NYC) and BBC Camp (U.K. L.A.)

name: Phoenix Circle Village
description: Black Light Art setting, KINO_DOME chill-out at night and “Russian BAR” at day, “Psybotik” parties of Techno/Minimal/Brakes/Full-On… our famous smoothie hour, workshops,lectures and most importantly our NYC-based vibrant international community!

name: PHOTOGARTHO
description: Photogartho is an interactive photography studio/gallery and chill spot where you can have your souvenir portrait taken of you in your playa finest whilst being served a refreshing drink by Miss Lemonada/Fresca.

name: Pi Camp
description: Join us at Pi Camp for thoughtful conversation and engaging discussion of all things scientific.  Come to learn, to teach, to be intrigued and to be awed by SCIENCE.  Bringing pie to share is highly encouraged!

name: Picasso Camp
description: Picasso Camp is back! We’ve got fresh paint, fresh canvasses, and fresh vibes for the playa. Always a participant’s best friend, our camp provides Burners a place to express their ideas on two huge canvasses 24/7. Our FUBAR is stocked and ready to serve and our crew of eclectic DJs set the mood. Our chill domes provide the space to create and collaborate!

name: Pickle Joint
description: Fresh, cold, crisp pickles and spicy Pickle-tinis served night and day, from your friends at Ye Olde Pickle Joint.

name: Pigamilions: Opposable Hooves
description: Make your way to Pigmalions Camp, where each morning, opposable-hooved servers offer a daily dose of delicious bacon. Prepare to squeeel for your Bacon and Bloody Marys – served each day, 11ish in the morning.  PIGMALIONS:  Opposable Hooves Are In

name: Pillowasis
description: Pillowasis is a cushioned respite for the weary traveler.

name: Pink Mammoth
description: Pink Mammoth is a not for profit house music and creative arts collective based in San Francisco. Pink Mammoth is above all a community, one that nurtures, encourages, and supports its participants in being and in learning to express themselves.

name: Pink Planet
description: This year, we will be hosting various sunrise parties at our camp starting Wednesday, September 2nd. Look for our pink glow from our bus on the night of the burn. We will be hosting our annual Burning Man party Saturday night after the man burns.

name: Pixelstad
description: Art, Music, Performance, and Bunnies!

name: Planet Earth
description: This is Planet Earth!  Looking for an alternative to techno/electronica?  Come kick it old school with the Black Rock city’s 80’s Dance Club.  New Wave, Synth, Goth, Industrial, One Hit Wonders.  We have it all, plus 300 of your favorite 80’s videos in stereophonic wonder!

name: Planetarium Camp
description: The Planetarium’s star speckled outer walls surround low seats inside to give the participant a view of the night sky, free of the light glare from Black Rock City. Additionally, “artificial” constellations, meteors, UFOs and other celestial events are superimposed over the real night sky in real time, constantly changing and filling the viewer with the awe of the Universe while providing some interesting celestial treats to make it fun and inspiring. Ever changing audio environments gently accompany the experience.

name: Playa Del Fuego Country Club
description: Come for the mini-golf, stay for the good spirits, leave on one of our art cars!

name: Playa Go Round
description: Come to Playa Go Round at 2:30 & Esplanade. With every rotation you spin into your Dreams & your future flashes before you while beats fill the ether. We are always open and you are always welcome! DJs from Denver, Seattle,& Reno www.PlayaGoRound.com. PGR presents The Rock Opera www.TheRockOpera.net

name: Playa Info
description: We’ve got all the information services at one, easy-to-find, location. Oracles answer myriad questions. The Directory lists locations of camps & participants, events, and rideshare; it’s also the place to send/receive messages. There’s also Lost & Found, Volunteer Resources, and bulletin boards.

name: Playa International
description: Back for another triumphant year! Our mission is to provide a home on the Playa for internationals.  We also host many Fantastic events. Including the now famous Zombie Crawl. We welcome all Internationals who want to join.  So come by and take a trip around the world. No Drop-Ins.

name: Playa Jazz Cafe
description: The Playa Jazz Cafe is back for its 5th year a with live nightly jazz performances and our signature Irish coffee. The Jazz Cafe is a musical sanctuary for the weary playa traveler lost in a sea of electronica. Musicians are encouraged to bring their instruments and help spread the magic of jazz!

name: PLAYA MAGIC
description: PLAYA MAGIC featuring Close-up Magic of THOMAS of Carson Valley, Nevada.  He will be performing 3 shows daily in an air conditioned, dust free zone.  30 minute show in the day who and one 40 minute evening show. You may request his appearance at your venue upon inspection.

name: Playa Surfers
description: Playa Surfers are ready to shred the knar again this year as we bring our surfcrafts to the playa. Make sure to stop by Lifeguard Tower #33 so we can Hawaii-five-O ya!!

name: Playagon
description: The PlayaGon is an infinite-dimensional hyper-inclusive object containing futurists, scientists, artists, ‘free-range synergists’, and more.  In this object you’ll find minds looking forward, listening inward, and reaching out.  Join us for mind expanding memes, rigorous debate, and good margaritas.

name: PlayaMonkey's Super#1 Fun Camp
description: We offer a relaxing illuminated chill space for playa monkeys, dreadlocked aliens, sexy robots, and all other curious evolving participants.  Discover us under our massive citywide beacon where visitors are invited to play with our lighting controls or relax within our dusty beautiful lush jungle.

name: Playaneer Emporium
description: Ladies & Gentlemen, lads & lasses, aunts, uncles & other household pests…Have you experienced chafing of the inner thigh? Dryness of the wenis? Wish you could find true love? Well step on into the Playaneer Emporium & find lotions & potions, goops & elixirs to make your every playa dream come true

name: PlayaPets
description: Playapets Camp is a group of people who strongly believe in the beauty of all our companions on our journey as humans.  We especially respect the role our domesticated animals have played along out evolutionary path and seek to honor it.

name: PLAYATART'S PARLOUR
description: PLAYATART’S PARLOUR barstools,tarts in aprons,playaserpent, plenty of fixins for the bloodies, let us thank you in our very special way.  Happy hours -whoredurves. Calling All tawdry tarts and Codgers strutt you wedges and huevos on over. We will whore ya up- if you aren’t already.

name: Playawastes Raider Camp
description: The Playawaste Raider camp is an oasis and refuge from the happiness and organization of the surrounding tranquility of the Playa. An island of chaos and mayhem festooned with the grisly remains and effects of those that have bored us.

name: Pleasair
description: PLEASair is a Sunset Happy Hour Bar dance club, operating from about 3pm to 8pm, Tuesday-Friday and 1pm-6pm on Saturday.  Guests are treated to Jet Fuel (Cactus Cooler soda and Tequila) and Flight Crew Homebrew (beer) if aged 21 and over.  DJs spin music with ample dance area provided under our shade cloth fuselage and wings and outer areas.

name: Pleasure Garden
description: In the welcoming shade of Pleasure Garden’s Sunscreen Station, we will tempt playa denizens with cold lemonade and sunscreen application. Our goal is to provide the Burning Man community with a little slice of paradise devoted to relaxation and exploration of the pleasures of the senses.

name: Pleasure Island
description: Pleasure Island is a haven for wayward boys and girls allowing them to act as they please without recrimination, turning to drink, cigars, gambling and lusty behavior as they gradually transform into jackasses.  Oldsters and youngsters are welcome at our Donkey Bar and Chat and Chill lounge

name: Pod of Bliss
description: A serene oasis where you can float in the frequencies created by an intimate crew of sound healers, body workers, and movement therapists.  Whether you come for tea and yoga at sunrise or a didgeridoo treatment by dusk, a visit to our calm dome may be the most relaxing space you’ll find at the Burn.

name: Poisoned Palace, The
description: Join us for morning tea and knitting classes, or come play 4-square, tetherball, double-dutch, and ladder golf at the Poisoned Playground.  After dark, belly up to the bar for a shot of liquid courage, then sing your pants off (literally) in the Palace’s karaoke lounge!

name: PolyParadise
description: PolyParadise has been influencing the Hearts & Minds for the past 10 years. We are a group of Polyamorists seeking to live our dreams, and this camp is one manifestation of that. Polyamory involves openness to multiple loving relatinships. Join us in a variety of events – Come in from the sun….take a load off your feet…

name: Poppycock
description: World renowned as the finest purveyors of Shrimp Tacos. I am requesting that you perform five jumping jacks for reading this.

name: Postal Telegram Office
description: Have your default-world situated loved-ones send a message transformed to art to their favorite BRC participant. The intended BRC Citizen will receive message delivered in person. Message can also be sent back to default-world.

name: Potato Camp
description: You like potatoes, I like potatoes. Come by for the potato cannon shooting gallery, potato events, a drink at the potato bar, or stuffing your face full of damn potatoes!  Burlap abounds.  Also OK if you don’t like potatoes. We’re crazy like that.

name: PPR: The Prod Pump and Rest
description: The Echo People return to run the Reflection (Wall-of-Lights) Dance Club & Bar at the “PPR.” Come entertain us with your rhythmic dance moves, maybe we’ll give you a special elixir or honor. Learn the secret word of the day, feel the Monolith  have you evolved? Make contact at the ‘Copy Cat’ party.

name: PRESERVED IN TIME
description: Preserved In Time is a camp that is within Barbie Death Village. This camp is where you seal what you want in a 3.oz. can, then create a label the tells you what is in your can, or you just open it in the future and have a surprise.

name: Primate Playground & BRC_GPS
description: DE-EVOLVE and join the monkey business @ the Primate Playground. Chill on our astro-grass under a parachute shade tree and upload BM city and art maps to your GPS. Enjoy some Improv-Improv, playground games, monkey art, and even a trickling waterfall. Whats more fun than a barrel full of monkeys!

name: Primitive Technologies
description: Come learn to make fire by friction, cook a meal with our solar oven, or observe the lotus flower as it morphs each day toward something primitive.  Pyramid and matching golden arches welcome you into the shade for an adult or other cool beverage.

name: Primordial Swamp
description: What the Garden of Eden would have been like if Burners were in charge!  Many, many blinky lights, music of all sorts, and hot and cold running Primordial Ooze on tap nightly.

name: Pro Leisure Tour
description: Pro Leisure Tour , Home of the “Couch Potato Research Institute and Darwin Lounge”. Classes per schedule , Drinks per order.

name: Projekteers Petri Dish
description: Visit our science art collective! Evolve new silica- and fiber-based life forms with our glass bead-making and micro-organism sewing during the day under our geometry tensegrity shade structure, and enjoy our geologic artworks, interactive games, and science experiments.

name: Prometheatrics
description: Bringing the Gift of Fire to Humankind since the Dawn of Time! Come experience the fully immersive Tesseract Mirror Box (Lasers, Blinkies and Pool Toys, oh my!), enjoy edifying Flow Temple workshops during the day and join us for nightly fire shows as we liberate the Spirit of Flame!

name: Psychic Taxi
description: Psychic Taxi provides transportation randomly. Our Random Service Taxis are pedal powered rickshaws that ferry travelers to Playa destinations chosen by our psychic drivers. Our Hammock pavilion offers shade and luxurious ease. The pedal powered, Psychic Taxi Nomadic Cafe is a roving bar.

name: Punctuated Equilibrium
description: We don formalwear each morning to serve coffee and play sophisticated music for you; as the day goes on, our music, drinks, and clothing de-evolve to baser forms. Our stage is always open for live music; sometimes we play alone, sometimes we play with you. Devolve daily at Punctuated Equilibrium!

name: PUREPLAYA
description: PUREPLAYA is a place were we except what is, while realizing anything is possible!  It is a place of creativity, transformation, and sharing.  We offer a ‘pure’ platform to the playa where anything can happen!  Come participate in this experiment with us!   Confused?  Great, hope to see you soon!

name: Purple Palace Camp
description: You’ve found the home of the Purple Palace art car and the Purple Parasites.

name: Pussy Hut
description: Offering a variety of services to make your kitty purrr. We aim to pamper and please with full body massages, shave and grooming services and other fun things to do. Bring your kitty on by the Pussy Hut and check our posted schedule of fun services. Meow.

name: Putt-Putt Playa
description: PPP is a fully interactive mini golf course for people of all ages, day or night. Stop by and play-a couple rounds… have a friendly competition with your camp mates… relax under our Club House shade structure, listen to chill music.

name: PVM (Positive Vibe Movement)
description: Spreading positive energy through art, sound, and community. We are The Golden Meanies, representing Evolution with Philosophy, Math and SPIRALS! This is the base camp for the Nautibus. Hop On! Help us build the biggest human spiral, starting at the Man!

name: Pyramid Scheme the sequel.
description: This is a 40′ pendulum swing with the ability to free your mind and heart and return you to a time when your life was much simpler. Remember jumping on a swing and pushing the limits of the swing, it was as if you were flying, free from all your worries. This swing is sure to deliver.

name: Pyronauts Camp
description: Pyronauts Camp is a magical environment dedicated to the progression of various dynamic art-forms including Poi, Staff and Hula-Hoop. Pyronauts Camp is home to our international all-star Fire Conclave troupe and a hot spot for anyone interested in these rapidly expanding forms of dance and movement.

name: Quantum Beats
description: On a mission to find a Beat so Perfect, all life in the Universe can feel the Vibe; an elite group of burners went into the desert to develop a top-secret project known as Quantum Beats. Join us on a musical journey through time and space in the hopes the next beat will lead humanity home..

name: Quoxtes Cabaret presents The Man
description: As Burning Man tips its hat to Darwins Ideas in 2009’s them, so we embrace it and add a little European twist The Man and Monkey Pub!  Our gift to the desert is a Pub and open mic Cabaret Stage where you can come and realise your Cabaret fantasies,Join us  for a pint of beer and enjoy the show

name: Radio Electra 89.9 FM
description: We put the ROCK in Black Rock City. Tune in for an eclectic array of music, mayhem and commentary. Theme camps, villages, and artists wishing to make radio announcements about events on the playa are welcome to stop in or contact us by email prior to the event. Celebrating our 10th year on the playa.

name: Random and Unnecessary Camp, The
description: If it’s Random or Unneccessary, you can find it here, from the Hatfeild/McCoy watergun battle, to really big drinks with really long straws, to domino necklace trading, to info/art on gods and belief of the past. Come by in/with something random and tell us what you would do for a Klondike bar!

name: Rathskellar
description: Rathskellar (nee Spikes Vampire Bar) is a den of mad scientists, libertines and sci-fi/DIY style. Find flavors of Goth/Industrial madness within our dome, libations at our bar, and the hottest playa performers on our stage. We are the dark, sexy and spooky that balances out the endless techno of BRC

name: Rave'Ns Nest
description: Rave’Ns Nest a place for good music, fun and refreshment.

name: RECLINERS
description: Relaxing on recliners evolved from the primitive lawn chairs used for camping. We have raised the bar by experiencing Black Rock City from mobile recliners.

name: Red Arrow Project, The
description: The Red Arrow Project is a set of 20 kites flown by a group of random participants. Each kite has a giant red arrow pointing in a different direction. When the kites are flown simultaneously they create a field of red arrows in the sky. The arrows suggest new paths of exploration and are reminder to stop, consider your direction and potentially head somewhere new. The kites, which are 4 foot x 4 foot nylon hexagons with graphic red arrows attached, will be launched by a group of team members but can easily be passed to other people as they walk by and view the project.

name: Red Eye, The
description: For all your bloodshot late-night cravings. . .

name: Red Lightning
description: Red Lightning is ablaze with inspiration for humanity to transform our connections with Earth, Spirit and one other. Within our Sacred Sanctuary, we aspire to awaken consciousness and provide solutions for our collective evolution through art, education, workshops, performance, ritual & celebration.

name: Redirection Connection
description: Welcome to the 2nd year of Redirection Connection Village! Drop in for a ride on one of the many Mutant Vehicles docked at the new hub/loading station for the Un-Official Public Transit System of BRC and get Connected for Redirection to another location on the playa!

name: Relaxomatic Plushitorium
description: At the Relaxomatic Plushitorium, you will find a madcap roller coaster ride of tranquility and repose — If it’s soft, squishy, and fun to sit on, you’ll probably find it here. Additionally register here to send your grilled Cheese-o-grams to your friends and enemies.

name: RELOVUTION
description: The RELOVUTION camp is a theme camp inspired by The Bastille, a symbol of despotism and freedom. But in this camp, the storming of The Basting is being done a little differently than back in 1789: it is done through love, art, sharing, and great music. Costumes and good vibes are a must…

name: Reno Housewives
description: Helping costume BRC since 1998. Do you need bridesmaids for your playa wedding, or are looking for the perfect outfit for that party? ASK US! From frumpy to fabulous, we have you covered.

name: RevoFuckinLution
description: CarboFuckiNation is back with a revolving evolutionary theme of RevoFuckinLution. Come drink a cold a beer and get down to some grooving music!

name: rEVOLVE Your Balls
description: Get a pair of balls! Golf balls that is…connected by a rope. Stop by and play a game of Nut Toss! Toss those nuts around our rack and score for points, prizes, and laughs. Celebrate your victory on our winner’s podium.

name: RhythmWave
description: RhythmWave theme camp is dedicated to the practice of dance as a moving meditation, an expression of who we are in each evolving moment. Everyone at Burning Man is invited to our shaded bamboo dance floor to participate in 2-3 sets of ecstatic dance daily, as well as yoga & meditation.

name: Risa
description: RISA is just like the resort planet from Star Trek, renowned for its breezes and easy-going, uninhibited sexuality. Our main attraction at Risa this year is the Peacock Shuttle. Look for Risa and the Shuttle within Redirection Connection Village!

name: Roarax Rounge
description: The Roarax Rounge in conjunction with delightful derelicts at the Hammock Hangout ask you to come by and SING, nay, ROAR your heart out with us at either our Roving Karaoke Destruction Unit, The Roar Shack or in the Shady Comfort of the Hammock Hangout!

name: Robosapiens
description: What happens when a giant robot awakens from its slumber beneath the earth during a weeklong art festival featuring 50,000 humans? Answer: Its robot friends throw a huge party! 🙂

name: Robot Heart
description: A global, lo-key crew that rocks great sounds with ghetto tech beats and a street fab attitude. We’re bringing awesome to the playa with BIG, clean sound, LED visuals, and new media art, featuring djs from NYC, SF, Hong Kong, London and more. Find us on the playa by following your Robot Heart.

name: ROBOTRONIA
description: Robotronia returns for its’ 10th attempt as a “theme camp”. Hotshot the Robot, Spectral Interactive Video Screens, d6 and Hug02 will be joined this year by The Mantis, Mr. Jellifish, and even a special performance from Zsu-Zsu. Show your (de)evolutionary skills while getting your photo with us in 09.

name: Rock Bottom
description: Sometimes you have to hit Rock Bottom and begin again.  8 years ago Rock Bottom was one of 3 camps who formed The Deep End.  Though the Deep End is now playa legend, some AARP members will gather for a more intimate celebration of high spirits and deep grooves.  Stop in, bring a bottle, and dance.

name: RockStar Orphans
description: From Seattle, we are a small family of orphans with a lot to offer. Come join us for: “The RockStar Treatment” (haircut,facial,footscrub,icedtea,reiki,massage), Sinner Chair, where your playa sins are zapped away And Ambient Live Music each evening. You will come away revived and energized!

name: Root Society
description: NEO@ROOT SOCIETY-Chapter 34:2009 – GI Syndrome(greed and irresponsibility)wiped out mankind except for a glowing group of survivors on the desert grid.  Drawn by the powerful BIG DOMES Force-NEO@ROOT SOCIETY promises truth in the future beats of our emerging civilization. Something large is looming!

name: RUB A DUB
