description: Come sit in the shade of Rub A Dub. Providing chill space, positive dub/reggae music,and Rub-A-Dub atmosphere. Some SF Bay Area Shredders.

name: Rubber Chicken Camp
description: At Rubber Chicken Camp we delight in the celebration of the Rubber Chicken. The camp is made up of artists working on the playa art installations, Eighth Wonder and The Watch. Information about the art installations will be available and there will be a Rubber Chicken social event on Tuesday evening.

name: Rue Morgue
description: Dedicated to saying goodbye to those that affected our lives so profoundly the Rue Morgue helps that process by teaching people to fold origami and placing the final art into our Playatech Goffins for their final destination “a temple burn”. At night we dance macabre New Orleans style!

name: S'mores n Amour
description: S’mores are not just a camping food, but a social experience. Come join us for S’mores every night at sundown then gather around the fire for campfire cheer and meeting new friends. Campfire singers and entertainers get a special surprise. Warning: marshmallows will get burned! S’mores 7-9 pm nightly

name: Sacred Spaces Village
description: Sacred Spaces Village comprises of mystics, artists, healers, and revolutionaries who are passionate about creating sacred spaces on and off the playa through visionary art, ceremony, teaching, and healing work.

name: Safer Sex Camp
description: Source of all your playa safer sex needs: condoms, lube, gloves, and plastic wrap for dams.  All kits are free, not for sale, not for barter.  Look for Outpost Bags.  Also, Erotic Fetish Wear from Rubber Inner Tubes(See What When Where) & Women’s Only Liquid Latex Body Painting (Fri 11:00am -3:40pm.

name: Sake Watering Hole
description: When the sun starts to set our 8 foot tall tubes of dry-ice cooled sake are awakened by beats from NightJuice, our velvety, pulsating art car. Come dance and be refreshed by our ice cold sake.

name: Sakenoma
description: Sakιnoma, Black Rock’s nearly famous Sakι-Bar, invites you to visit them during the hottest part of the day for the coldest Sakι on the Playa. Kanpai!

name: Sala Of Unnamed Love
description: Sala Of Unnamed Love holds space for sacred, movement & healing arts on the playa.  Get your meditation & yoga on, your capoeira Angola craftiness, and your games and exercises for being in the now and speaking from the heart.  And if you wanna instruct, let S.O.U.L. hear from you soon.

name: Salon Soleil
description: Salon Soleil is a welcoming space for personal exploration, self-expression, and interaction with other beings. We invite the Burning Man community to visit our quiet, reflective quadruple Do-Me Dome for one of our healing fairs offering massage, readings, or relationship counseling.

name: Samba Stilt Circus
description: Samba Stilt Circus is a constant party of Samba, dancing and sending love and light into the world with our music! We are talented beings in the acts of percussion, booty shaking and sweet singing sounds! We also take our act high in the sky with sexy stilts and keep the Samba circus playing!

name: Sandbox Camp
description: Ever wonder what the child in you is thinking/feeling/wanting? Play in a sandbox with little toys to find out more about your Self, or at least to think in symbols instead of words.

name: Save the Man
description: Camp Save-the-Man leads the yearly futile effort to preserve the Man from his terrible fate.  You’ll also find the panoramic wall of history with giant photos of BRCs past, the playa phone booth, Mandalas, saved ice, art cars and a nerdy group of fun folks.

name: SchweinKamp
description: SchweinKamp bows in adoration to all that is evolutionarily pink and porky – all that is bacon – and brings schweiny love to fellow burners. It’s a space for interpersonal management refinement and self-help for those cursed with hangovers, physical and metaphysical.

name: Science Vs Superstition: ChessKamp
description: Chess Kamp is Back: Challenge your chess skills in a symbolic battle of ideological opposites, using figurative chess pieces on a 4x4 chess board. Play the ultimate game of chess, pitting images of Evolutionary and sociological hope (Science, free thinking) against superstitious Creationism!

name: Semuta Lounge
description: “Semuta” is mentioned several times in the Frank Herbert “Dune” novels, but never in much detail.  It is described as a drug addiction that requires both a specific drug (“semuta”) and a specific type of music (“semuta music”) to work. Without the music, the drug is apparently fairly useless, but the combination of the two produces “sustained, timeless ecstasy.”

name: Sex Filth Avenue Boutique
description: SEX FILTH AVENUE was a great success. We gave away more than 1000+ Naughty sexy costumes. We need costume donations to make this happen again next year. Please send me a box of costumes. Please post any pics you have from SFA on the website below.

name: Sexy Trampoline
description: Sexy Trampoline…Come jump on our Sexy Trampoline and then have a cold beverage to cool your jets. The second rule of Sexy Trampoline is if it’s your first time at Sexy Trampoline…you must jump!

name: Shady Waffle
description: Burning Man can be pretty intense: the people, the music, the motion, the heat… our goal is to provide an escape from all of that. A shady, cozy nook on the playa where you can take a yoga class, meditate, or enjoy a peaceful breakfast.

name: Shadyvil
description: Shadyvil is home to the infamous BRC Shadizens. Beware the Shady Swarm!

name: Shallow End (of the gene pool), The
description: The Shallow End of the gene pool. Welcome to our “ool” notice there is no “P” in it, let’s keep it that way! Every one knows someone from the shallow end.  Come hang out with us, the main event on Thursday at 4 p.m. to 7 p.m. will be a poolside swimsuit competition, with judges, dance, and flirtinis.

name: Shaman Dome
description: Join us in a journey to find your power animal; to recover that lost soul you left with your ex:  to clear the door to your great cosmic dance:  and we protect you from most everything:::: but yourself:

name: SHIFT
description: SHIFT Camp is large, friendly, and devoted to evolving consciousness and having fun. We have a hot bar, talks, performances, comedy, and a cool dome for dancing. Presenters this year include Annie Harrison; Daniel Pinchbeck; Lorenzo Hagerty; Carolyn Garcia; and Amanda Feilding, Countess of Wemyss.

name: Shipwreck tiki Lounge
description: Shipwreck tiki Lounge. An actual vintage wood sailboat beached upon the rocks of a forbidden isle. Join the castaways for afternoon grog at their exotic tiki bar of hand made idols, gods and flaming totems. Beware of cannibals!

name: Signal?
description: A long time ago someone abandoned a pile of broken concrete in the desert. Baked by the sun, massaged by the weather, and permeated with the radio waves and latent energy leaking from our cities, something began to grow.

name: Silicon Village
description: Silicon Village welcomes you.  Visit our plaza – our 10+ Pods offer things such as live open-mike music + bar (Hair of the Dog), Happy Hours, Merkin Fashion Show, Mist’R Mister misting booth, Semuta Lounge chill dome, Windsurfing Lessons, daytime massage tent, giant pool table and more!

name: Sin City
description: “What happens in Sin City stays in Sin City.” Sin City is a place where freedom of expression is embraced. There are many things to see and do at Party Naked Tiki Bar, Playfully Yours, Club BamBam and much more. Come and check out our village schedule of happenings for planned events.

name: Sin City DJ
description: Come and grove to the custom tunes of DJ Makia here at Sin City. Enjoy a variety of mashes and techo tunes. Or just dance until you drop as we turn tunes into the night.

name: Sinister Minister
description: The Sinister Minister will ask for confessions, give penances, offer communion, and may accept indulgences.  Only the creative and truly perverse will pass – others will need to seek their life on another path. The lucky few will see the Bearded Child Film Festival. Camp will be operational Wed thru Fri from 2000 to 2200.  The Bearded Child Film Festival will be on Sat night starting after the burn.

name: Skinny Kitty Teahouse
description: Regroup and relax at the teahouse with Skinny and friends, a refuge from the unse, unse, unse, providing a  baby grand piano, space for performing, music, conversation, funk, art, copeira, and serving tea 24/7.  We are reliquarians.

name: Slutgarden
description: Hey fish-man! Khakis also seemed like a good idea to the troglodytes but this is the playa. Time to evolve! Let our sirens, satyrs and seamstresses soothe you with sinful fashions to excite your passions. We have the racks to put you back in the reproductive stack. Dance! Drink! Dress-The-Fuck-Up!

name: Snow Koan Solar
description: Snow Koan Solar provides solar-based power for burners who need to recharge anything from a camera battery to an art car.  We also serve chilly refreshments each afternoon when the sun is four fingers from the horizon.  Our motto:   Relax  Recharge  Rethink. Consider stopping by.

name: Snowflake Village
description: SNOWFLAKE VILLAGE, now in it’s tenth year, encompasses people from the Midwest, Canada, and around the world. Take an exotic instant vacation, hook up at Playa Speed Dating, visit a movie theater, ride an art car, interact with 24/7 sculptures and games…all in one place!

name: sober Free society
description: Impromptu sober Free meetings available when people are present.  Get proper sober Free therapy from the sober Free society.

name: Soleye
description: The Soleye Camp- is a fully participatory / inclusive camp in which participants will literly be able to look through the eye of evolution. We have a 9 foot tall , hand made abstract pivoting welded steel face with a third eye that participants can look through out to the art on the playa

name: Sore Nipple Camp
description: Welcome to the famous Sore Nipple Camp. We’re back for our second year as a theme camp, and with your help last year we, and everyone who visited us last year had a blast. If you missed us come check us out. We have the nipple wheel O’Fun, prizes, and great company.

name: Soulicious
description: Soulicious is filled with laughter beauty gratitude decadence and abundance. Anyone is welcome off the dusty street for an impromptu blindfolded pillowfight/winetasting/hooping game of tickling or simply to dance. Stop by Friday for SOULBRUNCH when we offer the yummiest eats and filthiest beats.

name: South of All Borders
description: Come down to our level to beat the heat of the day & to dance the night away. Enjoy Ice Tea & Sangria at our bar, add your touch to community art project “Hey Baby, What’s your Sign?” and enjoy rockin DJ’s, bands,& performers. At nightfall scenes from BRC will be projected high above camp.

name: Space Camp
description: Need Space? We have an infinite supply!

name: Space Cowboys
description: Wrangling the cosmos for well over a decade, the Space Cowboys are proud to provide the hitching post for the playa’s finest dancers, discos, djs, dreamers, and sugar daddys. but please don’t follow us, we’re only following the Mog…

name: Space Elevator
description: Space Elevator, elevating from the trance communities in the San Francisco Bay Area, featuring psychedelic trance, progressive trance, electronic and chill-out music on a 20,000 watt sound system, with local and international DJs from all over the world bringing their best music to you on the playa.

name: Space Monkey Mafia: The Theme Camp
description: Space Monkey Mafia: The Theme Camp presents The Multi-Media Dome, The First Church of Mary Jane & Wedding Chapel, and The Lifeforce Speakeasy. Different types of events will be held throughout the day like playa weddings, a vampire bar, and fun music & videos from all genres and eras.

name: Space Virgins / Area 47
description: The Space Virgins, Team Ubergeek and Camp in Bed have landed on the playa at Area 47!  The Space Virgins have also brought their ancient ones – the butterflies of Luminous Flux, with them to join the party.  Join us and our highly evolved ancestors as we play in Black Rock City.

name: Spaced Science Lab
description: Astronomers & rocket roadies invite you to stroke & ride our nose-cone. It’s been to space & back. Really.   Lounge in mega-hammocks & discuss the content & evolution of the Universe. Enjoy mid-day Sangria coolers at Dr.Stu & Nurse Jane’s Mammogram stand. Tiktaalik the walking fish car welcomes you.

name: Spank the Monkey's Darwin Lounge
description: Spank the Monkey’s Darwin Lounge. The natural selection for fun and enlightenment.  A Victorian themed lounge bar full of velvet floor pillows, crystal chandeliers and monkeys!  Stop by for a cold slush drink and lounging around with friends.

name: Spanky's Village
description: Spanky’s is home to Spanky’s Wine Bar, The Burning Band, Villains & Virgins, PVM (the Positive Vibe Movement) with their new Naughti-Bus, Hookah Homestead, Mystic, the Spank-O-Matic, the Orgasmatron, the Teeter Totter of Death, the Chairway to Heaven, the Centrifuge, Hello Camp, and MPR

name: Sparkle Pony Corral
description: Every camp has a sparkle pony-brings 60 costumes – forgets H2O.  Sometimes you need a break!  Bring your sparkle pony to our corral 1-2pm daily. We’ll stroke their ego & give them sustenance while your camp gets some peace & quiet. Sparkle ponies will be rehydrated, showered w/ compliments & ready to re-enter your camp.

name: Sparky's House of Phlame
description: Home of Sparky the Fire Truck and his crew.

name: Spearmint Dino Bar
description: Wet your whistle at the Spearmint Dino bar. None of that “barter for drinks” BS at our bar – this is a gift economy! We’ll fill you so full of booze you’ll have to ride home on our Dinocar.

name: Spider Melon Camp
description: Get your melon and bug fix at Spider Melon Camp. See the playa through the eyes of an arthropod, our segmented-bodied, exoskeletoned friends, and learn more about these pinnacles of evolution. After your Metamorphosis, dig your mandibles into some fresh, juicy watermelon, gifted everyday from 11-2.

name: Spilt Milk
description: Life is just spilt milk really.  Lets have fun with it! Improvisational troupe that pops your lid and leans you a bit so that the real you spills out

name: SPIN ART CAMP
description: Remember SPIN ART? We have created a four foot diameter, solar powered machine for you to create your own artwork and bring it home. We have core board canvas or take off your shirt and make a one-of-a-kind Burning Man Masterpiece. All are welcome daily from 3PM to 6PM.

name: Spinal Tap
description: Spinal Tap is a 14′ tall kinetic sculpture in the shape of a spine that attaches via steel cables to the participants back and translates their spinal movement.

name: Spirit Dream Interpretation Cafι
description: The roadside cafι of rest, experience, and Light for your journey returns for year number 9.  We serve the road weary our staples of Spiritual comfort with a side of dream interpretation and a dash of spice. Soak in the dome with a latte in hand as you process your encounter. Take time to transform.

name: Spock Mountain Research Labs
description: SMRL returns for it’s 12th straight year on-playa as world leaders in beverage science and leisure technology.  We drink lots of hyperwhiskey, write the Spock Science Monitor (BRC’s newspaper of record), hit people on the head with boards, and eat sandwiches.  Bring us sandwiches.

name: Spontaneous Planning Camp
description: Teaching the basics of building your own camp; how to secure your structure, building EMT conduit dome, tensegrity structures, PVC . Come and learn the basics to make your camp rock next year!

name: Squid Row
description: Squid Row: demented denizens of the deep. Enjoy the Tentacular Spectacular & spin The Wheel of Creationism. The Squid Row Sideshow bar mixes mutant cocktails by day as we play the cosmic game of Bio Bocce. In night’s chill,the Sideshow glows: warm cookies with milk & at least eight arms to hold you!

name: SS equipment yard camp
description: Support Services Equipment yard, camp

name: Stalker Camp
description: Stalker Camp is dedicated to the principle that everyone who wants a stalker should have one. Follow our stalking rules and your consensual stalking experience will be super!

name: STAMP CAMP
description: Stamp Camp is dedicated to create community and friendship while entertaining others with our array of rubber stamp body art.

name: Star Lush Lounge
description: The StarLush Lounge offers funky DJs, sound, Go-Go Pods, color-pulsing dance-floors, shadow dancing, a full service bar, hot pants and hot bartenders  in short, a groovin good time!

name: Stardust Lounge
description: When the Stardust Casino was reduced to a pile of ashes, dust, and memories, witnesses swore they saw a glittering swirl of purple smoke drifting Northwest. Pawn your jewelry and double down at the Stardust Lounge, where dirty martinis and dirtier cocktail waitresses rekindle the spirit of old Vegas

name: StateSide Dubstep
description: STATESIDE DUBSTEP CAMP RedLine & various other crews from across america bring you the StateSide Dubstep Camp! 5 nights of the best stateside dubstep djs america has to offer. Tons of surprises & sound provided by FSOUND!!!!

name: Steam Bath Project
description: Visitors are invited to enter the geodesic dome and relax on wooden bench where boiling water produces steam and negative ions that fill the dome.

name: Storybooks in Alleyways
description: Reclaim your childhood! Reclaim your history! Come share stories or spin some anew in this interactive storytelling camp. Workshops include spontaneous story creation through vocal, visual and other expressive art forms. The only true story’s the one on your tongue: the original evolutionary tale.

name: Sukkat Shalom
description: The purpose of Sukkat Shalom is to gather disparate sparks of the Divine contained in all persons, and to create a space of intersection, interconnection, and exchange between all religions and cultures present on the playa.

name: Sunrise Coffee Camp
description: Come over and visit us from sunrise until our pots run dry.  We will share hot coffee and all the fixings with you to greet the new day or finally send you off to bed! Use of personal cups is greatly appreciated.

name: SunSets
description: SunSets celebrates the rise of evening. We offer a fusion of music, art and words, both live and recorded, and offer our space as a place where people can fuse ideas or simply enjoy. We invite you to join us and create brilliantly memorable, strong and fun experiences to take back out into the world.

name: Super 8 Sasquatch
description: Come Yak with the Yeti upon his plush, fluffy pad. Receive the wisdom, warmth, and fuzziness from our friend of the forests.

name: SuperMonkeys
description: bringing light to our animal nature and how we make it better

name: Surly Camp
description: SurlyCamp – Home to the SurlyBird, the one and only bio-diesel art car with beats so good, they break your face. SurlyCamp is still home to a bunch of assholes, great beats, going big and bacon. Sorry about your face, whore!

name: Suspended Animation
description: Suspended Animation (formerly Suspense Camp) is back! Come experience full-suspension erotic rope bondage: part kinetic art, part thrill ride, part endorphin rush. Our crew of expert riggers offers bondage rides, workshops for all levels, breathtaking performances, and night time play parties.

name: Sweaty Betty's Misting Parlor
description: Sweaty Bettys Misting Parlor Rejuvenate, invigorate and experience an overall cooling sensation from head to foot as you stroll through our misting tunnel and watch the smiles emerge while body temperatures drop. Open each afternoon during peak heat on the playa.

name: Tabula Rasa
description: Tabula Rasa returns and resurrects her Playaterium (to enclose a gifting contraption) from the Vault to Heaven, legendary jewelry making big top, and popos galore.  Come, celebrate and EVOLVE in our seasoned chill spaces whilst creating art with our craftilicious array of supplies-Kids welcome!

name: Tahoe
description: Moonrise over the still waters of a high altitude lake in the Sierras.  The smell of roasting pine nuts.  Ah, Tahoe…

name: Tango'd Up In Blues
description: Bring your partner or grab one from the street and come dance with us to tango and blues music.  We’ll have the music going around the clock for you to come explore these two intimate dances with a friend, lover, or even a stranger.

name: taoscamp
description: an ongoing camp mostly, but not wholly, consisting of artists and contributors from taos new mexico

name: Tarwater
description: Cut Throat Bowling, Emerald City Croquet, Lady S’s Boutique, THE SKY IS FALLING!  Welcome.

name: Temple Camp
description: Formerly known as Get Lost, this year’s temple builders want to keep their corner of the playa, kickass neighbors & view.  On the edge of the playa things move a little more slowly and it takes a long time to get there, but it’s always worth the trip. We’re STILL all here cause we’re not all there.

name: Temple of the Hand
description: As a salute to the forces that brought us into this world, we bring you The Temple of the Hand. To honor our dexterous appendages, the temple of the hand will host the Museum of Opposable Thumbs, an interactive display that requires the temporary removal of the participants thumbs.

name: TempleOfTheFlyingSpaghettiMonster
description: The Temple of the Flying Spaghetti Monster is a nice little unassuming camp in which chilling is quite enjoyable.

name: Tequila Shack
description: Warning, Do not visit the Tequila Shack. All trespassers will be shot with a TEQUILA SHOT Shooting daily from 4 to 5.PM Monday through Saturday.

name: Terminal City
description: Terminal City- Your Evolutionary Dead End.  No Gas, No Food, No Mercy. An interactive village of the themeiest theme camps in Black Rock City!  Day and night activities, theme nights, games and art.

name: That Bloody Camp
description: That Bloody Camp returns with its haven of morning-after repose. We will cut through the dust of the playa and the previous night’s excesses with spicy bloody marys and even spicier servers.  And of course we will give you space to relax, connect and maybe even make a new friend.

name: Tiki Fuckos
description: Tiki Fuckos, your destination for debauchery, shenanigans and a few drunk Mexicans.

name: Tikidom
description: Tikidom returns to BRC with the Tikidom Performance Space!  We will be providing an intimate and fully equipped indoor venue plus a bar serving Tiki Tonic.  There will be nightly show times available for advanced booking as well as a few open jams.  Tia’s quesadillas will also be cruising the playa

name: Time Colony, The
description: The Historical Preenactment Society welcomes all appreciators of science and the mysteries  and wonders of past and future. Here Victorian-aged gentiles may drink along side space robots, etc., and time travelers of any era are welcome to relax and enjoy the moment.

name: Time of Your Life!
description: Venture into the Time of Your Life time capsule . Learn from our past mistakes and greatnesses, peak into ideas of our future.  Evolve to be able to live in this moment, the time of your life.  Margarita bar, dj’s, yoga, dancing, drumming, misting system, swamp cooler.  Chill by day, groove by night.
hometown: Costa Rica, Canada, Tahoe, Cabo, Italy

name: Tissue and a Plan
description: Lost? Confused? Runny nose? Don’t know what to go do next? Camp Tissue and a Plan is dedicated to making sure no burner wanders the playa without a clear plan and a clean tissue. ‘Cause all you really need is a tissue and a plan…

name: Tittyman Camp, The
description: The Tittyman Camp, come one come all.  I am building a City of Tittys, 2 by 2.  by day and a Titty Pirate at night.  Recieve a V.I.P. pass To the BURN for our art car/mutant vehicle , The Virmanator.  A 42 foot pirate ship.  Evolution every year we evolve at Burningman, evolve with us, The Tittyman

name: ToneAge - rEvolution
description: ToneAge  rEvolution is where weary souls find restoration in lucid beats, chill domes, radical veggieclusiveness and costumed cocktails (aye aye!): participate as we rendezvous, rejoin, rebuild, renew, reinvent, renovate. recreate, and relax.

name: Toon Town Disco
description: A discordian space to get your Toon groove on. Silly music, twisted toon artworks, heavy metal kareeokee, dangerouse projections, furry breakdancing, costume play, with no shame, no pc and nothing sacred. Not for children.

name: Tower of Emergence
description: The Tower of Emergence is a wood architectural sculpture that reaches nearly 60′ into the sky and is much like a stylized flower which has broken through a huge crack in the barren desert floor. This towering new species is a symbol of the processes of creation and formation that are occurring in and around us at all times, a never-ending process of becoming. How are we to emerge? What will we do to reorganize the scattered ashes of that which has past and fallen? What will we become as individuals, peoples, cultures, species, and as a world?

name: Tramp Stamp Camp
description: Get your very own custom tramp stamp (temporary tattoos only)!  Also expect random acts of levitation and laser light madness.

name: Transformation Beyond Zion
description: The Center that is Everywhere: From Beyond the Zion Curtain of Utah, experience a Transformational society of Artists, Inventors, Creators and Evolvers. Golden Hive Effigy, Fire Stage, Daytime Workshops, Fire Art, Ganesh ArtCar, 50 Hrz Healerz, The Giggle Collective, Utah’s Fire Conclave & more…

name: Transmorphagon
description: Transmorphagon A shape with as many sides as it currently has. An object that forces change. A catalyst for evolution. An incubator of enlightenment. A universal experiment, one million years in the making. It’s back, at black rock, once again pushing humanity to another level.

name: Trashistan
description: The Republic of White Trashistan’s Lamarckian laboratory is open for business. Come and see if being heckled and/or pampered affects your future offspring’s temperament. Home of Indra’s Net mobile chill space.

name: Tree Ring Circus
description: Follow wide forest paths to discover rock climbing challenges and bowers of curly willow where you can rest in shady hammocks.  In our tent youll find live music, frosty fruit smoothies, and a luxurious mister system by day, and by night well slake your thirst with luscious libations while you dance to some funky freshness at our tree ring house party.

name: Treehouse, The
description: The Treehouse is a tranquil dwelling atop a 20 foot tree growing from the barren playa. We offer a sunset wine bar and stunning views of Black Rock City around the clock. Come get high with us!

name: Tribal Thunder
description: We Like to Drink, We Like to Drum

name: Trifuckta
description: Pulsingtogetherloving theharmonyprecisionhightenedmotivationwinningfeelingstrengthunencumberedclarityfueled by3 truthsfreedommusicsex

name: Tropical Crocodile
description: The Tropical Crocodile evolved from a small family of Northwesterners who wanted to give back to the Burning Man Community. Our tasty beverages calm the mind while the misting tunnel is an oasis in the playa element. We promise a cool down with great people, just bring your own cup and pleasant attitude.

name: True Mirror Palace
description: The True Mirror Palace returns to the Playa ready to blow your mind with mirrors that reflect you truly – no flipped images.  Evolve your self-image to the new version of you – the true version – and put down the strange alter-ego that has been created by the backwards mirror for your whole life.

name: TSUNAMI CAMP
description: Bringing Live Music back to the playa! Exciting daily events such as Playa Fashion Makeovers, Body Painting, and Snow Cones made in the shade.  Special events like the 2nd Annual Lake Lahontan Syncronized Swim Team Ice Hockey Game.  Visit “Tudes” our evolutionary artfish and discover your future!

name: Twilight Over Atlantis
description: Atlantis is in crisis:  A black cloud hovers over the playa.  Sea life, jellyfish and lobsters, cling to the apocalyptic rain.  Down below, our art car ferries the Atlantean elite back to their homes in the stars.  A monster emerges from the depths.

name: Twilight Spaghetti Theatre
description: Its twilight and you know what that means. Time for a good show and nice spaghetti dinner. Swing by for open mic. After you’ve given us your best act of show and tell we’ll wine and dine you.

name: Two Lanterns Camp
description: Get hooked-up with an Unofficial Playa Civil Union (includes certificate and rings!) in the Marriage Dome or get a Black Rock Temporary Divorce, good until Labor Day. Our DNA towers over us, test your strength. Use the Annoying Phone Booth and be sure to obey our four-way traffic signal.

name: UBER TUBERS
description: UBER TUBERS Presents: TUBERS 2.0! Did you know that cooking tubers spurred the evolution of human intelligence? Look it up! Join us in celebrating our ancestral roots w/ the ancient art of spud humping & by noshing on tubers of all flavors. Have a ride on the Mr. PotatoHeadMobile & shake to the beet!

name: UberPod
description: We are the crew of the art installation “Steve The Robot H.E.Ai.D.” and friends!  You will also find the Monolithiator with us, our mutant vehicle for accelerating you into the next level of evolution.

name: Ultra Stunt Danger Academy
description: The Ultra Stunt Danger Academy is all about distinction.We search for the distinction between rational fear and irrational fear, and try to push the boundaries between.We examine the distinction between authority and compliance, and have been known to disturb the social fabric along these seams.We’re naughty like that.We are also a group of friends who have serendipitously created a Burning Man Town. First friends, then town. That’s how you do it.

name: Unintelligent Design Society
description: The Unintelligent Design Society (UDS) dedicated to demystifying the wonder bread of life, stirring the primordial soup and exposing the Warholian building blocks of creation in their most unintelligent form. To paraphrase Charles Darwin “We love fools experiments, we are always making them”.

name: Unnatural History Museum
description: The Unnatural History Museum will provide refreshment to all comers. Harking back to the time of Darwin and the ‘Origin of Species’ we will provide a ‘Victoriana’ themed bar and lounge bringing to mind the high culture and impeccable hospitality of England in the 1860’s.

name: Urban Jungle
description: The Urban Jungle Vision camp is an interactive, participatory camp facilitating and encouraging evolution of your personal vision.  Pimp your external vision by personalizing your sunglasses or picking up a pair of new ones, and expand you internal vision through noticing how the lenses through

name: V-SPoT, The
description: Discover YOUR V-SPOT!? Find out how to VOLUNTEER at Burning Man! (No advance sign-up required) Just stop by the V-Spot, where our volunteer experts will help you find your ‘special place’ in Black Rock City. Let us show you your V-Spot: this won’t hurt a bit, in fact we’re sure you’ll love it.

name: VAMP CAMP
description: Do include in your journey thru BRC a stop at Vamp Camp lounge at night and the Mr. mister lounge during the day. You will be able to enjoy the cool down of the mister lounge and the bidet in the heat of the day and you can enjoy the Vamp Juice and the warm Vamp culdrun at night.

name: VegCamp
description: How does humanity’s consumption of animals affect evolution? VegCamp invites people to consider the effects of their actions on animals, environment, & humanity.  For 2009 we’ve expanded our popular Ask-a-Vegan booth & have videos, lectures, discussions, cooking demos, literature, & interactive art.

name: Velvet Soulmine
description: Velvet Soulmine Saloon and Dance Hall is a cozy chill space where you can indulge in Southern hospitality mixed with Western resolve. This year the Soulmine has evolved and devolved, change is in the air. Vodka Party Friday not Saterday, freeky huh.

name: Vibrator Repair Camp
description: It’s amazing what playa dust can do to your “friend”. Bring that bad-boy to us and we will fix it! Open 24/7, walk-ins welcome, while you wait repairs, loaners. “We service you so that you can service you”. NO BATTERIES!!

name: Videogasm
description: Videogasm featuring independent / experimental video art on our 3 screens, nightly at Snowflake Village. Host of the BRC edition of the 48 Hour Film Project. Home of the renowned spray paint artists, The Spray Dogs. Come by and get tagger! Contact us if you have an original video you’d like to show at our Playa Theatre.

name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee Camp (VICC)
description: We serve up a delicious, authentic Vietnamese Iced Coffee Experience in the afternoons – Weds, Thurs, and Fri – the love is stirred right in!

name: Viking Ski Camp
description: Viking Ski Camp, us lovely kids from Europe (mainly brits) are hosting a Nordic winter wonderland, we have a ski ramp, warm mulled wine in those cold dersert evenings and marauding Viking attitude! Up Helly AA!

name: Vinland
description: In 1003, Leif Erikson founded Vinland, the first European settlement in North America.  Though it no longer stands, its descendants live on.  Join us at Vinland nightly for mead, fire, story, and song.

name: Virus camp
description: Our energy is infectious!  We focus on increasing conscious awareness through personal and spiritual growth.

name: Volcano Worshippers
description: Volcanic eruptions start with worship.  Please come and help us worship by sacrificing yourself on/in our shadow dancing/pole dancing Volacno.  “Burning MILF’s” are especially prized in our spiritual work.

name: Voted Best Camp
description: Bring your skateboards, put on your drinking caps, and of course, bring your appetite for destruction. VBC will wet your thirst for whiskey and Punk Rock with the usual romantic accomodations. After dark we are rated R so leave the kiddies back at camp. See you there.

name: VW Bus Camp
description: Camp with us in your VW bus and evolve, devolve, this our 12th year on the Playa. Visit and ride BusZilla 2, our articulating VW bus based, Mothra fighting, electric/gas late Pleistocene people mover. Return for great hula hooping and beer. We are evolutionary proof that the slowest survive on love!

name: Wabi
description: Camp Wabi is a comforting home base for new friends and a jumping point for adventures which will lead you all across the playa to amazing wonders you’ve never imagined! Come for stories, puzzles, and friendship!

name: Wander's Camp, The
description: Our Camp is an oasis on the playa for the Wandering Burner who happens upon our camp and finds HUGS, Hot Dogs, Sacred G, Sacred L.O.V.E. Readings and Energy Healing Sessions. We also provide information about the Black Rock’s early inhabitants/explorers/wanders, provided on a kiosk for all to enjoy!

name: Want It
description: Want It understands more than anything what it is to desire. We are a camp that celebrates wanting and the importance that desire places as a driving force in life. Push it further. Want it harder. Want It!

name: WearYourFunkyHatPantsCamp
description: What are funkyhatpants? I dunno, just wear them!

name: Where's Waldo? Camp
description: Howdy all you Playa Goers!!! Join your old pal Waldo as he adventures through the wacky wonderland of Black Rock City.  The search is on! Have YOU found Waldo yet?

name: Whiskey & Whores Saloon
description: We got whiskey…we got whores…what else do you f-ing need?! Saunter on in to spin our wheel of misfortune and give us a big yee-haw for a shot that’ll rot your gut. Driving a MV? Pull in out front for Tillie’s Service Station: Performing Services for Art Cars. Let us get you & your riders pumped!

name: Whiskey Lounge
description: It’s a barrel of monkeys!  Two oak barrels and a whiskey buffet.

name: Whisky and Dust @ Mile High Club
description: Whisky and Dust is a theme camp at the 2009 Burning man event. This is the new evolutionary concept of the Mile High Club. The Concept is simple. Capitalize on what the Burning Man community desires more of (Yoga, Healing, and amazing hand Jobs). At the same time be challenging and creative to show the community something, anything, new and different. The Ladder might prove to be the hardest to accomplish.

name: White Dragon Noodle Bar
description: We will serve stunningly delicious noodles with shiitake mushrooms every day at sundown. Come explore our surly attitudes and dangerous drinks. Fire our burn-off tower. Learn to sumo. View the whole city from our tower.

name: White Light Warrior
description: White Light Warrior is an interactive camp utilizing “Vehicles of Ascension” designed to allow one to comfortably leave his body, with re-entry being optional. An individual is able to create his own time and space in a relaxed position, and return to a Gala Event; Burning Man ’09

name: WhiteTrashSuperstars F**K yr couch
description: All are welcome to come by and pimp out your cup with some bling! Enjoy our white trash lemonade, while being entertained by your fellow burners on our community stage. We have shade and couches to escape the heat of the day. We have All types of music playing. p.s. Fuck your couch!!! )'(

name: Windbinge
description: Keeping close contact to the basic elements of the Playan environment An Ode to Wind We have wind caps, head wraps that keep that dust out. Stop by for a soothing vinegar foot soak and fresh squeezed lemonade. Forward thinking evolutionists, stop by to discuss educational philosophy. Swirly & Shade

name: Winterland
description: Winterland ~ An Evocative Grateful Dead Theme Camp

name: Wishing Star
description: Wish upon a Star! Come to Wishing Star Camp and make a Wish that will burn in the Temple to join the Stars in the heavens. Will you Wish for something for yourself? A friend? Money/Fame/Power? Health/Love/Knowledge/Peace? That special friend? A long hot shower? We Wish you positive intentions…

name: womb, The
description: Cats get cosy in the womb. bring your own bowl!

name: World Evolution Discoasis
description: The World Evolution Discoasis is here to seek out the future of imbibing.  Futuristic interactive drinking games will play an integral part of the spring break carnival fun nestled away in our oasis.  What will coney island be like ten thousand years from now?

name: world pece
description: the camp is called world peace

name: World Wide Wall
description: Wall for Evolution welcome you to express all you thoughts, wishes, angst & dreams on the street art wall of BRC. Street art and music during the day, vj’s, dj’s and life band during the nights. Come over to keep a trace of your passage on the BRC’s Wall. www.trafik.be/burningman09jeremie (at) trafik (dot) be

name: XPAT ALIEN
description: To accommodate the growing number of aliens choosing Earth as their permanent residence, XPAT ALIEN hopes to smooth the transition to Earth based partying. Come share a beverage and swap intergalactic tales with fellow XPATs at the Crop Circle Cantina… look for the blue and silver circus spaceship.

name: Yabba Dabba Dome
description: Theme camp based on the Flintstones TV show. The featured attraction is a 32′ diameter dome made to look like a house in Bedrock, with a fun interactive play space inside.

name: Yellow Gorilla Lounge
description: The YGL will be dedicated to providing a setting for those seeking a unique experience. Participants inhabiting this defined space will be persuaded to dress in underwear to nourish a common basis for a shared group experience. A stage with lighting, sound, and planed activities will be available.

name: Yes Please
description: Yes Please is the answer to every question.  Come meet sexy, open-minded, international, friendly, dancing, writhing people.  And be sure to visit our infamous Non-Monogamy Advice Booth, occasionally staffed by real doctors!

name: Yes! Have Some
description: The Tiki Gods command you to lounge and drink, right in the “Yes! Have Some” camp. Sacrifice your sobriety to the Angry Tiki Gods during the sundown rituals each evening at the ever-evolving Tiki Lounge. Partake in a variety of Tiki-themed attractions, or just come by to hang with the have somes.

name: YMI?
description: A wood canvas for painting will be in front.  No room…there is always plenty of bodies to paint on.  When the light goes out, the lightsabers will come on.  Boozing up is highly recommended.

name: YOU ARE HERE
description: YOU ARE HERE! CAMP — THE COSMIC CONTINUUM TAKES YOU FROM STARDUST TO PLAYA DUST! WE INVITE ALL BURNERS ON A PLAYFULLY STIMULATING ORGASMIC JOURNEY FROM OUR ORIGIN 13.6 BILLION YEARS AGO IN THE CATACLYSMIC EXPLOSION, THROUGH THE COSMIC SOUP, ENDING WITH A CLIMACTIC RE-ENTRY BACK TO THE PLAYA.

name: YOU KNOW YOU WANT IT WANT IT
description: Visit YKYWIWI throughout the week for all your afternoon interactive needs. This year, The Battle Kandy Zombie Tribe will again present present the popular This American Life Tea and Story Time and will bring back the ever essential Intergalactic Licensing Bureau.

name: Yummy RUMInations
description: Home to the fabulous Yum Cart. Hospitality services by day and Rumi readings by night.

name: Yurt Cafe
description: The Yurt Cafe will feature afternoon tea, shady refuge, and impromptu dust storm parties.

name: ZanZibar Lounge & Bar
description: Returning again, bringing lots of requested Playa love back.  If you have a playa mood necklace, you already know us from the past 8 years! Come have a drink, dance, relax, whatever and enjoy what we’re spinning and chill in our beautiful Moroccan bar and lounge.

name: Zenbobway
description: Zenbobway. Stop.  Open your eyes.  Stop.  Open your mind.  Stop.  Think.  Stop thinking.  Enjoy.

name: ZOMBEEZ
description: An undead shit-show with an predilection for beez. Come join in on the grotesque debauchery. Lurch by the Crypt during the undead hours to resurrect your passion for brainz, booze, and beez.  Warning: super sloppy fun times await you. (High-five!)

name: Zondernaam
description: Community Closet and Chill Space. We have a colorful shady daytime oasis (complete with Reclinerator), for relaxing to lounge music and enjoying good company. Our daytime Community Closet rack is full of crazy sparkly shiny sexy items…and our motto is, “Take a piece, leave a hug!”

name: Zookeeprz Camp
description: The Zookeeprz of Missoula Montana is a core group of friends and family representing heavy bass and party culture for the Zootown (Missoula MT) Massif.
